item.tib: 'dul ba gzhi
item.skttrans: bi na ya ba s+tu
item.coloph: 'dul ba'i gzhi rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po sar+ba dz+nyA de ba dang / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / kha che'i mkhan po d+har+ma ka ra dang / lo tsa ba b+han de dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // thub dbang zla ba'i zhal nas byung gyur pa/ /gsung gi me tog char pa yid 'ong rnams/ /lta ba ngan zlog snyi ba med pa yi/ rang gzhan yun ring skye dgu'i nang gnas shog/ //
item.volcoloph: Revision note in smaller dbu can script at the end of volume kha: dpe ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa 'brug rgya mtsho dang/ tog pa dge slong don grub lags//.
item.note: In volume ka, folio numbers 146-155 are skipped and indicated on f.156, but the text seems complete. In volume kha, folio numbers 330-339 are skipped and indicated on f. 340, but the text seems complete. In volume ga, ff. 4, 5, and 416 are missing; several folios between f. 65 and f. 85 are indicated with the same number but distinguished between ordinary and latter ('og ma) folio. The placement of the verse lines in the final colophon differs in D; S and V concur with Z. In V, L, and T, this work is placed later; S and Ty have the same order as in Z.

item.tib: so sor mthar pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: pra ti mog k+sha sU tra
item.coloph: 'dul ba so sor thar pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan pa'i bka' lung gis/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 'di la sho lo ka bdun brgya yod/ bam po ni gnyis su byas so/ /'dul ba lung gzhan dag la bka' lung so sor thar pa bzhengs pa mi snang mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir gtso bor dge slong pha'i dgag pa'i bslab pa rgyas par ston pa/ dge slong pha'i rnam par 'byed pa'i rtsa ba lta bu yin la/ lung rnam par 'byed pa ni 'grel pa yin pas/ dge slong pha'i so sor thar pa'i mdo 'di yang lung rnam par 'byed pa'i dbu nyid du bris so//
item.note: The colophon is significantly longer than in D and also V; it concurs with S and Ty and provides a reasoning for the sequence of works. In V, L, and T, this work is placed later; S and Ty have the same order as in Z.

item.tib: 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa
item.skttrans: bi na ya bi b+hang ga
item.coloph: 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs so// //dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpa' lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis/ /'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang / / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /'di la shu lo ka ni nyi khri lnga stong yod/ bam po ni brgyad cu rtsa gsum du byas so// 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs so// //
item.volcoloph: Revision note in smaller dbu can script at the end of volume cha: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa ldum bu ba zangs dkar ras pa dang / tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags// bkra shis //. Revision note in smaller dbu can script at the end of volume ja: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa/ mu lto zangs dkar ras pa dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags/. Another note on the right margin indicates the scribe, but it is too small to be clearly legible.
item.note: In volume ca, f. 368 is missing, in volume cha, ff. 2-3. In volume cha, ff. 244-248, a part of the text is duplicated. In volume ja, all folios after f. 138 were renumbered more recently and individual numbers skipped.

item.tib: dge slong ma'i so sor thar ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: b+hi k+Shu Ni pra ti mo k+Sha sU tra
item.coloph: dge slong ma'i so sor thar pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag / dpal btsan po'i bka' lung gis/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang / /zhu chen gyis lo tsa ba cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa
item.skttrans: bik+Shu NI bi na ya bi b+hang ga
item.coloph: dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ /so sor thar pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po sar+ba dz+nyA de ba dang / /d+har+ma ka ra dang / /rgya gar gyi khan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in small dbu can script on the left margin: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa/ mu lto zangs dkar ras pa dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags/. Scribal note on the right margin: klu khyil pa tshe ring nor bus 'dul ba nya pa bris pa lags//.
item.note: The colophon in D adds further information on different revisions of the text; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi
item.skttrans: bi na ya k+Shu dra ka bas+tu
item.coloph: 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / /d+har+ma shrI pra b+ha dang / /lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal 'byor gyis bsgyur//.
item.volcoloph: Revision note in smaller dbu can script at the end of the volume ta: ma dpe ji ltar zhus dag pa zangs dkar ldom bu pa dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags//. Revision note in smaller dbu can script at the end of volume tha: ma phyi ji ltar 'dug pas zhus dag pa sprang po zangs dkar ras pa dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags//.
item.note: Volume ta is considerably damaged, in particular on the right side of the folios and towards the end of the volume. Missing folios in volume tha: 2-8, 81, 499. The colophon in D and V is much more extensive; S and Ty concur with Z.

item.tib: 'dul ba gzhung dam pa
item.skttrans: bi na ya ud ta ra gran tha
item.coloph: 'dul ba gzhung dam pa rdzogs te/ u pa lis kun dris pa rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Scribal and revision note in smaller dbu can script at the end of volume da: mkhas pa rnams kyi lug+s bzhin du rin chen don grub bdag gis bris pa la phyi mo ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar ras pa 'brug rgya mtsho dang / tog pa dge slong don grub lags/ /; further also a brief note in dbu med: shel dkar gyis phran rin chen gyis bris. Revision note in smaller dbu can script at the end of volume na: phyi mo ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar ras pa dang tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags//; further, a scribal note in tiny dbu can script: shar ngos dpon kyis bris legs/.
item.note: Missing folios in volume na: 343b-346a. A longer colophon is provided in V; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
item.skttrans: sha tra sa ha sri ka pra dz+nyA pa ra mi ta
item.coloph: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa rdzogs so
item.volcoloph: At the end of volume tha, dedicatory verses are added, in the same writing as the main text: bdag ni sems can thams cad la/ /yid bzhin nor las lhag pa yi/ /don mchog grub pa'i bsam pa yis/ /rtag tu gces par 'dzin par shog /gang du su dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid kun las dman blta zhing / /gzhan la bsam pa thag pa yis/ /gzhan nyid mchog tu 'dzin par shog /spyod lam kun tu rang rgyud la/ /rtog cing nyon mongs skyes ma thag /bdag gzhan ma rungs byed pa na/ /tsan thabs gdong nas bzlog par shog rang bzhin ngan pa'i sems can rnams/ /bde sdug drag pos gnod mthong tshe/ /rin chen gter dang phrad pa ltar/ /rnyed par dka' bas gces 'dzin shog /gang la bdag gis phan btags pa/ /re ba che ba 'che ba 'ga' zhig gis/ /shin tu mi rigs byed na yang / /bshes gnyen dam par lta bar shog /gzhan gyis bdag la phra dog gis/ /bde bskur la sogs mi rigs pa'i/ /gyod kha rang gis len pa dang/ /rgyal kha gzhan la 'bul bar shog /mdor na mngos sum brgyud pa yi/ /phan bde ma rnams kun la dbul/ /ma yi gnod dang sdug bsngal kun/ /'bad pas rang la len par shog /de dag kun kyang chos brgyad kyi/ /rtogs pa'i dri mas ma slad par/ /chos kun sgyu mar shes pa yi/ /zhen pa'i 'chings las grol bar shog /sdug na kun gyi sdug bsngal khur/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skyems par shog /skyid na dge ba tshogs su bsngo/ /phan bde nam mkha' gang bar shog /sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal bdag la smin/ /bdag gi dge bas de kun bde thob shog /sems can kun gyi stug bsngal pdag la smin/ /bdag gi dge bas de kun sdug bral shog / /sems can kun gyi sdig grib bdag la smin/ /bdag gi dge bas de kun sangs rgyas shog /sems can kun gyi phan bde sgrub pa'i phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par mdzad du gsol// //dge'o dag go /sar+ba mang+ga laM//. At the end of volume na, dedicatory verses are added, in the same writing as the main text: sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gtsug gtor thams cad skyob/ /'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub 'od srungs dang / /shA kya thub pa goo tam lha yi lha/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can don du bdag gis sngon/ /dka' ba gang zhig byas gyur dang / /bdag gis bde ba btad pa yis/ /bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /bdag sngon nad pa'i don gyi phyir/ /rang gi mtsho ba yongs btad pas/ /sems can phongs pa bskyab pa'i phyir bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /nor dang glang chen shing rta dang / /rin chen byang chub phyir bas/ /bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /bdag gis sangs rgyas rang rgyal dang / /nyan thos pha dang ma dang ni/ /drang srong la mchod byas pas/ /bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /bskal pa bye ba du mar bdag /sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong gyur cing / /byang chub don du thos btsal bas/ /bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /bdag gis brtul zhugs tshul khrims dang / /dka' thub yun ring byas gyur cing / /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ngas mthong bas/ /bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /bdag sngon brtson 'grus dad ldan pas/ /rtag tu bstan zhing pha rol gnon/ /sems can thams cad sgrol don du/ /bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /bzod rtul rtag tu gnas gyur cing / /sems can nyon mongs snyigs pa yis/ /sems can ngan bzod byas gyur bas/ /bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /bsam gtan rnams thar gzugs med dang / /ting 'dzin gang+gA'i ji snyed pa/ /bsgom pa'i de ltar bdag gis ni/ /bstan pa yun ring 'bar gyur cig /ye shes don du bdag gis sngon/ /dka' thub nags dag bsten byas shing / /bstan bcos du ma gnyer bsten pas/ /bdag gi bstan pa 'bar gyur cig /brtse bas rgyu ba'i sha khrag dang / 'tsho ba yongs su btang gyur cig /yan lag nyid lag ngas btang bas/ /chos tshul rnam par 'phel gyur cig /bdag sngon sdig pa'i sems can rnams/ /byams pas gsal bar smin byas shing / /theg pa gsum la rab bkod pas/ /chos kyi mchod sbyin rgyas gyur cig /bdag sngon thabs shes gyur pa na/ /sems can lta ngan las grol byas/ /yang dag lta la bkod gyur bas/ /chos ni rnam par 'phel gyur cig /bdag gis sems can sdud dngos bzhin/ /nyon mongs sems las thar byas shing / /bdag gis 'phel sdig pham byas pas/ /bdag 'khor yun ring gnas gyur cig /bdag gis mu stegs can gzhan dag /lta ba'i tshul las ngsgral byas shing / /yang dag lta la bkod gyur pas/ /bdag 'khor rtag tu gus gyur cig /.
item.note: Missing folios in volume ka: 2; in volume kha: 43; in volume ga: 318; in volume nga: 70b and 71a, 280b and 281a, 297b and 298a, 426; in volume ca: 191-199; in volume cha: 351; in volume ja: 300b and 301a; in volume nya: 52, 59, 68, 91b and 92a, 110b and 111a, 349b and 350a; in volume ta: 123b and 124a, 152b and 153a; in volume da: 36b and 37a, 179b and 180a, 328b and 329a, 336b and 337a; in volume na: 63, 448b and 449a. Further, the following anomalies were noted: In volume ga, the order of bam pos in incoherent; in volumes ca and cha, both bam po as well as chapter indications are in disorder; in volume ja, ten additional folios are attached at the end of the volume, but their location is unclear and their foliation was repeatedly changed; in volume nya, most folios after f. 201 feature one too many of the abbreviate strokes for hundreds; however, when the number is spelled out for the even hundreds (300, 400, 500) this mistake is corrected; in volume ta, foliation jumps from f. 402 to 503; obviously all later numbers must be corrected by a hundred; in volume da, several chapter indications are missing; in volume na, both bam po and chapter indications are in disorder. In general, all 'bum volumes show numerous signs of later textual emendation; the overall state of the collection is unclear, many bam po and especially chapter indications are missing, and if they are indicated their order is often confused. Compared to S, there is a general difference in that S has a consecutive bam po count, whereas in Z the bam po count newly begins with every volume. The volume number, dum bu, is often indicated with the bam po marker. The Stog version of 'bum lists 76 chapters and thus concurs with similar long versions as found in Hemis or Namgyal, etc., but it is different from the version with 72 chapters as listed in D as well as S or Ty. Further, the Shey 'bum section shows many traces of usage in ritual recitation. Along with other differences in style and layout, this suggests that this part was perhaps produced earlier and then incorporated in the latter collection.

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa
item.skttrans: A r+ya pan ca ping sha ti sa ha sri ka pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA
item.coloph: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa rnams dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yum/ nyi khri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/
item.volcoloph: Added at the end of volume ga: oM sU pra ti Sh+Tha badz+ra ye s+wA hA// mang+ga laM/. Added at the end of volume nga, in only slightly smaller dbu can script: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa bskyed pa'i yum/ stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so// /ye d+har+ma he du pra b+ha bA he dun te/ Shan ta thA ga to h+ye ba dang te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA ma hA shra ma Na ye/ oM sar+ba bid+yA s+wA hA//.
item.note: Missing folios in volume kha: 186b and 187a, 229, 322, 326b and 327a, 373b and 374a; in volume nga: 12b and 13a, 280. Only the volumes kha and nga have bam po markers, some of which are in disorder. The colophon in D is much more extensive than Z; S, V, and Ty are nearly identical but differ slightly from Z. The chapter distribution across the volumes is similar in Z and S, except for chapters 26 and 27, which are placed at the end of volume kha in Z, but at the beginning of volume ga in S.

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya A Sh+Ta da sha sA hA sri ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta na ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.volcoloph: Short editorial note at the end of volume kha: gcig zhus//.
item.note: Missing folios in volume kha: 347b and 348a; in volume ga: 86b and 87a, 145b and 146a, 344, 351. Chapter 55, which is placed at the end of volume kha in S, is missing in Z. In volume ga, the section between chapter 68 and 71 seems confused. The end of the text in volume ga is missing, including the last chapter marker and the colophon. In general, between Z and S there are minimal differences in the designations of individual chapters.

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya aSh+Ta sA ha sri kA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAk+ya se na dang dz+nya na si d+d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de d+har+ma tA shI la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab/ slad kyis dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi dpal lha btsan po bkra shis lha sde btsan gyis bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+hA Shi ta dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos 'grel pa dang mthun par bsgyur/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI baM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi 'grel pa la gtugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab/ yang slad kyis kyi slad gnyer thang na mo cher/ paN+Dita chen po dI baM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo ts+tsha ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gnyis kyis brgyad stong pa bshad pa'i dus su che long zhig gtan la phab/ phyis ra sgreng gi gtsug lag khang du lo ts+tsha ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis rgya gar gyi mdo gsum la gtugs nas lan gnyis gtan la phab/ slad kyis yang lo ts+tsha ba de nyid kyis bshad pa mdzad cing phran tshogs kyang gtan la phag dus phyis lo ts+tsha ba chen po shAk+ya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe dang yul dbus kyi dpe du ma bsags nas gtan la phab/ slar yang snyig dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po/ /zha lu lo tsA ba dpal rin chen chos skyong bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis/ /rgya bod gyi dpe du ma dang bstun nas shin tu rnam par dag par mdzad pa'i ma phyi dang / rgya dpe gnyis dang / /bod dpe par ma rnams la gtugs te/ shAk+ya'i dge slong mnga' ris rab 'byams pa dpal 'byor rgyal mtshan dang / skad gnyis smra ba'i btsun pa kun dga' chos bzang gnyis kyis/ rnam 'gyur lcags pho stag lo'i mchu'i zla ba'i tsan+d+ra tshes kyi dkyil 'khor nya yongs su gang ba'i nyin/ yar stod sham+bu ste bde 'byung gi gangs ri chen pos mdzes [...]
item.volcoloph: Dedicatory verses are added at the end of the volume, in normal dbu can script. The beginning of these is part of the missing folio 397: [...] chos kyi dam bskyed dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ de yi de ring khyed bzhi byed bkra shis shig /dge 'dun dam pa chos sngan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyi mchod pa'i gnas/ tshigs gyi mchog rab ngo tshar shes dang dpal gyi bzhi/ de yis de ring khyed la zhi byed bkra shis shog /'byung po gang dag 'dir b+hU tA ri sa mA ga tI ni s+thi tA ni b+hU mA ba tha wA n+ta rI kShe/ kur+ban+tu mai tri sa ta taM pra dzA su di wA tsa rA trau tsa tsa ra n+tu d+har+m+maM/ /ya d+maM ga laM sa ka la sa t+wa hr-i di s+thi ta s+ya/ sar+bA t+ma ka s+ya ba ra sar+ba ku lA dI pat+ya/ niH she Sha sa t+wa dza na ka s+ya ma hA su kha s+ya/ tan+mang+ga laM b+ha bAn+tu r-i t+ya wA rA b+hi She ke/ ni lhags gyur tam/ /sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khyod pa 'ang rung/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog /bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /kun gyi bdag nyid rigs kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /sems can ma lus bskyed byed bde ba chen po ste/ /bden pa des kyang dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /ye d+d+har+ma he tu pra b+ha wA he tu n+te Shan+tA bA ga to h+ya wa ra ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM wA dI ma hA shra ma Na/ /oM su pra ti Sh+Tha badz+ra s+wAhA/ shu b+ha mastu sar+ba dza ga tAm// //chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / /de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/ de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /shin tu rab gnas rdo rje ma/ /'gro ba thams cad bdag par gyur cig//.
item.note: Missing folios: 37, 52, 397. The last missing folio includes a part of the colophon and the final dedication. The colophon, which provides concrete dates, is more extensive than in D, but concurs with S, also with F.

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sa pa ta sha hi kan nA ma pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa rdzogs so// //skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab po//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brgya pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pany+tsa sha ti ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brgya pa rdzogs so// //skad gsar bcad kyis bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sany+tsa ya gA thA
item.coloph: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so/ /gsar 'gyur gtan la phab pa//
item.note: In Z and S, the beginning of the Tibetan title differs slightly from D. The colophons in Z and S concur, whereas D is more extensive and provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badz+ra tshe di kA na ma pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya ar+d+ha sha ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka na
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//

item.coloph: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa rdzogs so//

item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya s+wa l+pa a k+Sha pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pany+tsa bing sha ti ba pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po
item.skttrans: ar+ya b+ha ga wa ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA hri da yA
item.coloph: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po rdzogs so//
item.note: The phrasing of the Tibetan title differs slightly from D but concurs with S.

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po'i theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sUr+ya gar+b+ha ma hA sU tra

item.tib: 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsan+d+ra gar+b+ha pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu bzang po theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya padz+nyA pA ra mi tA sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag na rdo rje'i mdo theg pa chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra ma tA badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag na rdo rje'i mdo theg pa chen po rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA badz+ra ke tu ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo rdzogs so//

item.volcoloph: Added in standard dbu can script at the end of volume nga: oM ye d+har+ma/ he dun te/ Shan ta thA g+ha to/ /h+ye wa dang te Shan ts+tsha yo ni ro d+ha e waM b+ha ti ma ha shra ma na yE s+wa hA// dge'o// dag go//.
item.note: Volumes ka and cha are missing. In the collection, the second volume is marked erroneously with the volume signature ka instead of kha on the folio margin. References in the text, however, refer to this correctly as the second volume. In the catalogue, all information is given with the correct volume signature, that is, kha. Missing folios in volume kha: 11b and 12a, 186b and 187a, 228b and 229a, 266, 302; in volume ga: 18-19, 28-29, 32, 213; in volume nga: 10b and 11a, 171b and 172a, 225b-234a, 235b-237a, 244b and 245a; in volume ca: 175b and 176a, 200b-203a. In S and L, chapters 35-38 are included in the third volume ga, while in Z these are found in volume nga. In S, bam pos are counted continuously, while in Z they have a new beginning for every volume. In volume ga, in particular, the bam po numbers are often confused, which might indicate that the volume was produced from various different sources.

item.tib: sdom pa gsum bstan pa'i le'u zhes [bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo]
item.skttrans: tri sam pa ra nir de sha pa pa rta na ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ //sdom pa gsum bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po rdzogs s+h+yo// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 2-9, 16. Also a part of the Tibetan title is missing. The colophon in S has an added phrase not found in Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a nan ta mu kha pa ri sho d+ha ni nir de sha pa ri pa rta na ma ma hA ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las / 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// // / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra b+ho d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs rag shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //sho log stong gnyis brgya/ bam po bzhi'o//
item.note: Missing folio: 66. The colophon in S has an additional phrase not found in Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ar+ya ta tha ga ta a tsin d+ya gu h+ya ner de shA na ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyis rnam grangs le'u ste phrag brgya pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ /gsum pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang da na shi la mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyis lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad sar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 158b and 159a, 177. The colophon in S has an additional phrase not found in Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa rmi lam bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ru s+wa pa na nir de she nA ma ma hA ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// //'phags pa rmi lam bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi pa rdzogs s+yo//
item.note: The colophon in S is much more extensive and provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ar+ya a myi ta b+ha b+h+yu ha
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ lnga pa rdzogs s+h+yo// // / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa dang zhus//
item.volcoloph: Contains a list of the length of the individual texts at the end of the volume: dum bu drug pa'i dang po 'di la/ sdom pa gsum dang ldan pa shu lo ga dgu brgya/ bam po gsum bzhugs/ sgo mtha' yas rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa shu lo ga stong nyis brgya/ bam po bzhi bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa shu lo ga gsum stong / bam po bcu bzhugs/ rmi lam bstan pa shu lo ga stong / /bam po gsum dang shu lo ga brgya bzhugs/ 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa shu lo ga dgu brgya/ bam po gsum bzhugs// zhus dag /oM sar+ba b+yid s+wA hA//. In Stog, this listing is provided for each text individually.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga ta A ka b+ya s+ya ta sa b+hu ha na ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las// //'phags pa bde bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa bkod pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u drug pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //bam po lnga dang / shu lo ga bzhi bcu//
item.note: The last two chapters are marked as 5 and 6 instead of 4 and 5. In S, the colophon first gives the length of the text and then the translators and revisers.

item.tib: go cha'i bkod pa bston pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste 'dus pa bdun pa rdzogs+ho// //lo ts+tsha ba mgos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur ba'o//
item.note: The title provided at the beginning of the text differs slightly from the phrasing in the colophon and also from the phrasing in other Kanjurs. The colophon in D does not mention Chos grub as translator.

item.tib: 'phags pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+ha r+ma d+ha tu pra kri ti a sa ma b+he nir de sha na na ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po/ chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa chos kyi dbyings dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa rdzogs// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na myi tra dang / su len dra bo de dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The colophon in S adds further the length of the text.

item.tib: 'phags pa chos bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa chos bcu pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ dgu pa rdzogs s+ho/ /shu lo lnga brgya sum bcu mchis/
item.note: The phrasing in the colophon differs slightly from S, which adds also information on translators and revisers, as does D.

item.tib: 'phags pa kun nas sgo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ar+ya saM na ta mu kha pa ri ba rta na ma ma ha yA na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/_//rgya gar gi mkhan po dzi na myi tra dang/ su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The colophon does not repeat the title of the text.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo / /stong phrag brgya pa las 'od zer kun tu bkye ba'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dub pa gcig pa// //rdzogs s+h+yo//
item.note: Folio numbers jump from 329 to 340, with the missing numbers being marked on the latter folio. The colophon in S differs slightly.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ar+ya man rdzu shi ri b+hud d+ha k+she tra gu na p+yu ha na na ma ma hA yA na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u/ /stong phrag brgya pa las// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya'i le'u ste/ bc+wo lnga pa/ rdzogs s+ho//
item.note: This text is marked as no. 15 in the dkon brtsegs section, as it is also in S and D, while the last text was no. 11. In Z, the three texts in between are listed in the succeeding volume, while S and D have them in their proper order. The colophon in S is more extensive and provides details of text length and translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba mtheg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya b+hA d+ha si na tA pi Ta ka na na ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam /grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa// rdzogs s+ho// a tsa r+ya su ren dra dang / shi len dra dang /_a tsa r+ya dar ma ta shi las bsgyur cing / zhus te/ skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: This text is marked as no. 12 in the dkon brtsegs section, but placed after no. 15. The colophon in S further mentions the length of the text and differs in phrasing. Missing folios: 5b and 6a.

item.volcoloph: Added after the final text in normal dbu can script: zhus dag/ dge'o// mang+gA laM// oM A ra pa tsa na d+hi hUM/ oM ma Ni pad me hUM/ o M badz+ra pa Ni hUM phaT/ oM A ra pa tsa na d+hi hUM/ oM ma Ni pad me hUM/ oM badz+ra pa nI huM phaT/ bkris//.
item.note: In D, the title at the beginning of this text is given in a slightly different form, S concurs with Z. The title given in the colophon differs slightly from S. This text is marked as no. 14 in the dkon brtsegs section but placed after no. 15.

item.tib: 'phags pa yab dang sras 'jal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pa ti pu tra sa ma ga ma na nA ma ma hA ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa de kho na nyid nges par bstan pa/ yab sras mjal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi len dra bo de dang / 'dzi na mi tra dang /da na shi la dang / zhu chen chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar cad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 10b and 11a. The folios are numbered consecutively, but parts of the text are dislocated. In particular, there is a larger gap in the text of ca. 15 folios between f. 40 and f. 41. The missing text and chapter markers are placed afterwards, with further textual confusion. The colophon in S further adds the length of the text.

item.tib: 'phag+s pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+g+ya rA s+ta ba ma pa ri brid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / da na shi la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba band+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad sar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la 'phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ar+ya ug gra pa ri brid tshA na ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsags pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes pa zhes bya ba// //le'u bcu dgu pa/ rdzogs so// baM po gnyis dang sho log ka bdun brgya bcu/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren tra po de dag /zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la 'phab pa//
item.note: The colophon in S gives 900 stanzas and three bam pos as the length of the text, while here 700 stanzas and two bam pos are mentioned, even though three bam po markers are found in the text. Missing folios: 356b and 357a.

item.tib: glog thob kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsgs pa chen po'i mdo/ /stong phrag brgya pa las/ mi bzad pa'i gter bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu pa rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Short dedication at the end of the volume: bkra shis par gyur cig /sar+ba mang+ga laM//.

item.tib: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba bud d+ha ra ha s+ya pA ya ko'u shal+ya da nyA nod ta ra po d+hi sa ta pa ri phrad tsa pa ri pa rto na na ma ma ha ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa zhes bya'i le'u ste gsum bcu brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab bo/ /bam po bzhi dang sho lo ka bcu gsum pa bzhugs so//
item.note: Volume 46 is missing from the collection, hence the catalogue proceeds with text no. 38 of the dkon brtsegs section. The length of the text given in the colophon of S differs; D lists different translators and revisers. Missing folios: 46b and 47a.

item.tib: 'phags pa tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya b+ha dra pA la shre Sh+Tha pa ri prid tsh+wa na ma ma hA ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ gsum bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te/ gtan la phab pa/ sh+wo lo ka drug brgya/ bam po gnyis/
item.note: The colophon in S does not mention the number of stanzas.

item.tib: bu mo rnam dag dad pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po'i mdo/ stong phrag brgya pa las/ bu mo rnam dag dad pas zhus pa'i 'dus pa ste// //'dus pa bzhi bcu pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in S gives 'Gos Chos grub as translator, who is not mentioned in D or Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya me'i tra ya prid tsa pa ri ba rta na ma ma hA yA na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsags pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu gcig pa// rdzogs so// bam po gcig dang / shu lo ka bcu// / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad sar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mi'i tre ya pa ri pri tsa nA mA ma hA ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo'i/ chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / da na shi la dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The colophon in S further mentions the length of the text.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya kA sh+ya pa pa ri pa rta nA ma ma hA ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs/ le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa 'od srung gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// //bam po gsum// //shu lo ka dgu brgya// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shi len dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad sar chad kyis kyang bcos nas stan las phab pa//
item.note: The colophon in Z gives the length of the text, which is not mentioned in S or D. Missing folios: 114b and 115a.

item.tib: 'phags pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya rad na rA shi na ma ma hA ya na su tra

item.note: The length of the text given in the colophons of Z and S differs. Missing folios: 171b and 172a.

item.tib: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ar+ya A k+sha yA mA ti pa ri prid tsa na mA mA hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las blo gros mi zad pa'i zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// //sho lo ga gsum brgya bam po gcig/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhe bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sab ta sha ti gan na ma prad nyA pa rA mi ta ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te / gtan la phab pa/ bam po nyi shu dang / sho lo ka ba brgya//
item.note: The length of the text given in S differs, quite likely this is based on a scribal error in Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa rtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ar+ya rad na tsu ta pa ri pid tsa na ma ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dar ma ta shis las zhus te skad sar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas stan la phab pa/ sho lo ga dgu brgya ste/ bam po gsum pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 271b and 272a. The colophon in D mentions different translators and revisers, S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya shi mA la de bI sing hA nA na ma ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //sho log drug brgya// bam po gnyis pa//
item.note: The colophon in both S and D provides the names of translators and revisers not given in Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya byA sa pa ri pr-id tsha nA ma ma hA yA nA sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ zhi bcu zhe dgu pa rdzogs te/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / da na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad sar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.volcoloph: Added at end of volume: mang+gA laM//.
item.note: Missing folios: 332b and 333a.

item.tib: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya b+ha dra kal pi ka nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra sing ha dang/ lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 11, 76b and 77a.

item.tib: 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar cad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 1-4, 65b and 66a, 82b and 83a, 95b and 96a. The title is taken from the colophon since the first folio is missing.

item.tib: sangs rgyas kyi sde snod tshul khrims 'chal pa tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: bud d+hA pI Ta ka dur shI la gra hA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: mdo sde rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par thar pa theg pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi sde snod ces bya ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha r+ma shrI pra b+ha dang / lo tsa ba dge slong dpal gyi lhun pos/ pho brang lhan dkar du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mai tri ya pras+thA nan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA war ma dang / dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sa bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya da sha b+hu mi kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sa bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: Text not found in Tshal pa.

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bu d+ha b+hu mi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, ga (vol. 33), 138b4-149b6.

item.tib: mngon par byung ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: a b+hi ni skra ma na sU tra
item.coloph: mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya d+har+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bud+d+ha ba lA d+ha na pra ti ha r+ya bi kur+ban ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa
item.skttrans: nA gA rA ja da rA ga thA
item.coloph: klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzog+s so//

item.tib: dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mdo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: b+hik+Shu pra ri dzu sU tra nA ma
item.coloph: dge slong la rab tu gces pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa
item.skttrans: bud+d+ha a b+hi Shi kam nA ma sto tram
item.coloph: sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la ka ra war ma dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa/ gcig zhus//
item.note: Text is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: 'phags pa snying rje pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya kA ru NA pun Da ri ka nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa snying rje pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len dra bo d+he dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 173b and 174a.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa'i mdo
item.coloph: 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal chems rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, nga (vol. 34), 307b4-308a7.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sap ta ta thA ga ta pU r+ba pra Ni d+ha na bi sheSha bas+tA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shi len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa// //bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo sde rin po che'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ni Sh+Tha tan b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na bai pu la l+yan sU tra rat+nan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo sde rin po che'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+h+yo// // /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nya bar ma dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing ha dang / sar+ba dz+nya de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mahA yA no pa de sha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
item.note: Missing folios: 2b and 3a, 9b and 10a.
item.chap:
bden pa'i bstan pa'i le'u'oMW1PD127393mdo, cha531PD127512mdo sde
22b1

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i do
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bud d+ha sang gI ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: sangs rgyas 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal dbyangs dang / dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus//

item.tib: 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya brah+ma shrI b+yA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+d+yA ka ra sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya shrI ma ta bra h+ma NI pa ri phr-id tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: kun du rgyu ba sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: dIr+g+han kha pa ri brA dza ka pa ri prid tshA nA ma sU tra
item.coloph: kun tu rgyu sen rings kyis zhus pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //bka' dang por gtogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa gser gyi phye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su bar+Na bA lu ko pa ma nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa gser gyi phye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo de dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI pa ri prid tshA nA ma ma hA nA sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: dga' bo rab tu 'byung ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: nan+da pra b+ha dz+ya sU tra
item.coloph: dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //'di bka' dang por gtogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the name of a reviser.

item.tib: 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsin+t+ya rA dza sU tra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya u pA ya ko'u sha l+ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: Missing folios: 175b and 176a. The colophon in D mentions the length of the text.

item.tib: 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tri skan d+hA ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas bstan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pra ti b+hA na ma ti pa ri prid tsa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye sh+se sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: prah+ma dzA la sU tra
item.coloph: tshangs pa'i dra ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: zla ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: tsan+d+ra sU tra
item.coloph: zla ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //'di dang thar pa lo tsas bsgyur ba de mdo gcig tu snang//
item.note: The note at the end of the colophon is found also in S but not in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo chos kyi rnam grangs chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bud+d+ha mu ku Tan nA ma mahA yA na sU tran ma hA d+har+ma par+ya yan
item.coloph: theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i chos kyis rnam grangs chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAk+ya sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The colophon in S concurs with Z but is not recorded in Skorupski 1985.

item.tib: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i brgyan theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: sar+ba bud d+hi ba kha ya a ba ta ra dz+nya na A lo ka lang ka ra ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya shad d+ha pa la d+ha nA ba ta ra mu dra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya shu rang ga ma sa ma d+hi sh+da nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: Missing folio: 3. The colophon in D lists different translators and revisers, S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i chos 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pra shAn ta bi nis tsa ya pra har+ya nA ma sa mA d+hi mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 133b and 134a.

item.tib: 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba d+har+ma s+wa b+ha ba sa ma tA bi pan tsi ta sa mA d+hi rA dza nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he d+har ma tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: Missing folios: 224b and 225a, 238a and 239a, 269b and 270a, 272b-274a, 297b and 298a, 407. Chapter 15 is named slightly differently in D; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: don rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: ar+tha bi ni sh+tsa ya nA ma d+ha r+ma par+ya ya
item.coloph: don rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Added at the end of the volume in dbu can script: oM ye d+har+m+mAhe tu pra b+ha wa he tun+te ShAn+ta ta thA ga to h+ya baM dat/ te Shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM wA dI ma hA shra ma NaH s+wA hA// //dge'o// bkra shis par shog/
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'dus pa chen po las 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bo d+hi sat+wa k+Shi ti gar+b+ha tsa kra da sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'dus pa chen po las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa las/ bde ba'i don 'thob pa yongsu gdams pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //ban d+he rnam par mi rtog pas rgya las bsgyur pa'o/ /mdo 'dir skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la ma phab pa'i 'gyur snying pa 'ga' zhig gda' 'o//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions a further translator.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga ta gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAk+ya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa khye'u bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsa tur dA ri ka sa mA d+hi ra nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa khye'u bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sa mA d+hi a gra ud ta ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa rdzogs so// //mdo 'di la mkhas pa blo gros zhib mos dgongs 'tshal//
item.note: Both Z and S have a phrase added to the colophon not found in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mA yo pa ma sa mA d+hi nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions a different Indian translator, S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sang gA ta sU tra d+har+mA pA r+ya ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ad b+hu ta d+har+ma par+ya ya nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ su ren dra bo d+he dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa mar me dbul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pra dI paM d+hi nA yA nA nA ma ma hA yA nA sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa mar me dbul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya kAr+ma A ba ra na pra ti sa ba d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions a further Indian translator; S concurs with Z, but the colophon is not recorded in Skorupski 1985.

item.tib: 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+har+ma ke du d+hA dza pa ri pri ts+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The Tibetan name of the text differs slightly in D; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa sprin chen po zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sprin chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ang gu li mA lI ya nA ma ma hA ya na su tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAk+ya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he d+har ma tA shI la dang / rgya'i lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he tong A tsar+ya la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 301b and 302a.

item.tib: 'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tra ya sting shad pa ri bar+ta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sum cu rtsa sum pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 307b and 308a.

item.tib: 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA shru tam nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+d+he dge ba dpal gyi bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid d+yA ka ra sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he de ba tsan tras zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mud pA da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bo d+hi sad t+wa tsAr+ya nir de shan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsin t+ya pra b+ha sa nir sho nA ma d+har+ma pa r+ya ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs s+ho// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The title in D differs slightly and the colophon in D mentions a further translator. S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bo d+hi pak+Sha nir de sho nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes 'sgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: Missing folios: 407b and 408a.

item.tib: 'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya na a k+Sha ra ka ra da da bai ro tsa na gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi ku r+bi ta pa ri bar+ta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: [...]_rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+he dang / 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba b+han d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 442b and 443a. The first part of the colophon is on the missing folio.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions a further translator.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shri ni r+de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume, in slightly smaller dbu can letters: ma dpe ci lta'i zhus dag pa sprang po zangs dkar ras pa dang/ tog pa b+hik+Shu dz+nyA na kar+ma lags//.
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gi mkhan po pradz+nyA war ma dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he legs kyi sdes bsgyur / rgya gar gyi mkhan po padz+nyA war ma dang / dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The Tibetan title is taken from the colophon. The identification at the beginning of the text gives the name of a different text in both Sanskrit and Tibetan: rgya khar skad du/ Ar+ya ga ga na gan dza pa ri pr-id tsa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//. Even though the folio is marked as belonging to volume tha, at one point it was obviously confused with the first folio of volume mdo tsha. Missing folios: 12-13, 20.

item.tib: 'phags pa rnga bo che chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ar+ya ma hA b+he ri ha ra ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA kar pra b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in smaller dbu can script: phyi mo ci lta'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa sprang po 'brug rgya mtsho dang/ tog pa dge slong ye shes 'phrin las lags so//.

item.tib: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa
item.skttrans: bud+d+ha nA ma sa hA sra pany+tsa sha ta tsa tur+t+ri pany+tsa da sha
item.coloph: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// //glegs bam bco lnga tsam la gtugs te/ mtshan 'dra min dang gong 'og mi 'dra ba mang du snang / da dung brgyad brgya bdun cu tsam ma rnyed pas/ 'di nyid kyi glegs bam rnams nas mtshan rnam dag nges pa can rnyed na gzhug par 'tshal//
item.note: Missing folios: 23b-25a, 98b and 99a, 107b and 108a. The colophon features an additional explanation also found in S but not in D.

item.note: In Z and S, the last two chapter are given as 5 and 6 instead of 6 and 7, as it is found in D.

item.skttrans: da sha bud+d+ha ka na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war+ma la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya aSh+Ta bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions a further translator and also the length of the text; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya aSh+Ta maM ga la kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war+ma la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions a different translator; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya maN+Dal aSh+Ta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sog+s pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mr-i ta war+na na ma ma hA yA na sU tra

item.coloph: yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //bam po bcu gcig rgya las 'gyur/ 'gyur rnying pa skad gsar cad kyis ma bcos par snang ngo//
item.note: The bam po markers end with no. 5; the same is found in S. In D, a further chapter 11 is indicated, not found in Z or S. The colophon indicates this as an old translation from Chinese. The same is found in S and V but not in D. Missing folios: 39b and 40a. Many of the folios after f. 200 are falsely marked with three crosses, thus indicating the number 300. On other folios the number is corrected to 200.
