item.tib: 'phags pa chos yang dag par bsdud pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+har+ma sang gI ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos yang dag par bsdud pa stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo las rtsom pa med kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI gar+b+ha dang / bi dza ya shI la dang / shI len dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// //chos kun bgro ba dang 'gyur khyad cung zad tsam snang ste/ mdo gcig cing skad gsar bcad yin no/ the tsom mi 'tshal lags//
item.note: The colophon features an editorial remark not found in S or D. All folios marked as no. 400 plus should be corrected to 300 plus. Missing folios: 307b and 308a.

item.tib: 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+har+ma skan d+ho nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po prad dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //bka' 'khor lo dang por gtogs pa'o//
item.note: Z, V, and S feature a brief editorial remark not found in D. All folios marked as no. 400 plus should be corrected to 300 plus.

item.tib: theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: d+har+ma sa mu dra na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya las 'gyur ba skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la ma phab pa'o//
item.note: While D points to a revision of the text, Z, S, and V indicate that it was not revised. All folios marked as no. 500 plus should be corrected to 400 plus.

item.tib: 'phags pa chos dang don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+har+ma ar+tha bi tsam ya na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos dang don rnam par byed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: All folios marked as no. 500 plus should be corrected to 400 plus.

item.tib: chos bzhi pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: tsa tur d+har ma ka sU tra
item.coloph: chos bzhi pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //bka' 'khor lo dang por gtogs pa'o//
item.note: Z, S, and V feature a brief editorial remark in the colophon not found in D. All folios marked as no. 500 plus should be corrected to 400 plus.

item.tib: mdo chen po lnga gsum pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pan tsa trA yan nA ma ma hA sU tram
item.coloph: mdo chen po lnga gsum pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pa'i bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: All folios marked as no. 500 plus should be corrected to 400 plus.

item.tib: mdo chen po sgyu ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: mA ya dzA lan nA ma mahA sU tram
item.coloph: mdo chen po sgyu ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / /padz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //glegs bas du ma la gtugs te / /zhus dag ci nus bgyis / bstan pa rgyas par shog//
item.note: The short editorial remark at the end of the colophon is also found in S, not in D. All folios marked as no. 500 plus should be corrected to 400 plus.

item.tib: 'phags pa namkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badz+ra man Ta nA ma d+hA ra nI mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya gu Na rad na sang ku su mi ta brid tsa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The text is also included as no. 34 of dkon brtsegs section.

item.tib: 'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya rad na dzA li pa ri prid tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rin chen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes snying po sdes bsgyur ba/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya rA dza a ba bA da ka nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //bka' 'khor lo dang por gtogs pa'o//
item.note: Z, S, and V end with the same short editorial phrase. The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mahA me g+ha su trad da sha di ka bo d+hi sat+wa sa mud dra sa mA ga ma ma hOd sa krI To nA ma pa ri bar+ta
item.coloph: mdo'i rgyal po chen po sprin chen po'i le'u re re la/ chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'du ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi glog gis gsal bar byas pa'i le'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las dga' ldan na gnas pa la sogs pa/ 'jig rten grangs med pa dang mthun par 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las byung bas dbang byed cing/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsh+tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a ba lo ki ni nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad ces gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas bstan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 169b and 170a.

item.tib: 'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya rad nA lo ka nA ma d+hA ra NI mahA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che las/ /dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzung+s kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Folios after f. 200 are marked as 300 plus but should be corrected to 200 plus. One folio is marked as f. 267-270. Missing folios: 229b and 230a.

item.tib: 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya kar ma A ba ra Na bi shud d+he nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyis mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: All folios marked as no. 300 plus should be corrected to 200 plus.

item.tib: 'phags pa rin chen zla bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya rad+na pa ri prid tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rin chen zla bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bad+ya ka ra sim ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he de wa tsan tras zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: All folios marked as no. 400 plus should be corrected to 300 plus.

item.tib: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: bu da d+ha a nu s+m+ri ti sa ma d+hi sa mu dra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: mdo 'di sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i 'jug ma rdzogs pa sgyur 'phro lus par snang ste mkhas pas legs par gzigs 'tshal//
item.note: This text is not included in Tshal pa. All folios marked as no. 400 and 500 plus should be corrected to 300 and 400 plus.

item.tib: 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya par mAr+tha d+har+ma bi dza ya nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: All folios marked as no. 500 plus should be corrected to 400 plus.

item.tib: 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: A r+ya tsa dur d+har+ma nir de shan nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsa tur d+har+ma kan nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in ordinary dbu can script: dpe gzhi ji ltar zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa 'brug rgya mtsho dang/ tog pa dge slong ye shes 'phrin las lags// bkra shis//.
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, pha (vol. 44), 401a3-402a5.

item.tib: 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sA ga ra ma ti pa ri prid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs s+h+yo// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / bud+d+ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 11b and 12a, 96b and 97a.

item.skttrans: Ar+ya sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri prid tsa nA ma mahA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas/ bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folio: 310.

item.tib: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri prid tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+h+yo/ /mdo che ba'i nang nas bkol bar snang ngo/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar gcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Z, S, and V feature a brief editorial note not found in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri prid tshA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+hes ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsan drot+ta rA dA ri ka b+ya ka ra Na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 349b and 350a.

item.tib: 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bi kur pa rA dza pa ri prid tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya brah+ma dad ta pa ri prid tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang / pradz+nyA war+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //sho lo ka sum brgya mchis so/ oM ye d+har+ma he tu pra b+ha wA he tun+te Shan+ta thA ga to h+ya wa dah / he ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM wA dI mahA shra ma Na ye s+wA hA/ glegs bam du ma la gtugs nas zhus dag ci nus bgyis/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar bar shog//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in ordinary dbu can script: mi phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa mul lto zangs dkar pa dkon mchog yar 'phel dang/ tog pa dge slong ye shes 'phrin las lags// dge'o//.
item.note: The very same phrasing at the end of the colophon is also found in S and thus a striking proof for a close connection to Z. Missing folios: 434b and 435a.

item.tib: dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: sad d+har+ma pun Da rI ka nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la gdams pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sba ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gcig tu 'dus pa/ thabs mkhas pa chen po/ theg pa gcig tu bstan pa/ don dam pa bsgrub pa bstan pa rdzogs so// //gang na mdo sde 'di yod par/ me ma mur gyi dong 'bogs shing // spu gri gtam las 'dzegs nas kyang / rigs kyi bu rnams 'gro bar bya/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Z, S, and V have an additional phrase in the middle of the colophon, which is not found in D.

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The opening phrase is missing, only the Tibetan title is given. Text is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ka na ka bar+Na pUr ba yo ga na ma
item.coloph: gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sad pu ru Sha sU tam
item.coloph: 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har ma ka ra dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he bzang skyong gis bsgyur/ ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis//

item.tib: 'phags pa sbyin pa'i legs pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dA nA nu shang sa
item.coloph: 'phags pa sbyin pa'i legs pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The title of the text in Z, S, and V differs from D. The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: gaN Di'i mdo
item.skttrans: gaN DI sU tra
item.coloph: gaN+Ti'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa dga' ba can gyi mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya nan+da ki sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dga' ba can gyi mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: lha'i mdo
item.skttrans: de ba sU tra

item.tib: mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo
item.skttrans: a nid t+ya sU tram
item.coloph: mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pra t+yud pan na bud+d+ha sa ma mu kha a bas+thi ta sa mA d+hi nA ma hA yA sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAk+ya pra b+hA dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ratn+a rak+Shi tas zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: da ba na mu kha nA ma sU tra
item.coloph: mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //glegs bam du ma la gdugs te zhu dag ci nus bgyis/ shAk+ya'i bstan pa dar bar shog//
item.note: The colophon differs greatly from D; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya da sha di ka an d+ha ka ra bid+h+waM sa na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he rtsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 2-3.

item.tib: 'phags pa thar pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sbyangs te sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The phrasing of the title at the beginning of the text of Z and S differs slightly from D. The colophon in D provides details on the length of the text.

item.tib: 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ma hA san ni pa tAd ma hA yA na sU trad ta thA ga tra shrI sa ma yan nA ma ma hA yA na sU trAn
item.coloph: 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sar+ba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs so//
item.note: The short editorial comment at the end of the colophon is also found in S and V but not in D.
item.chap:
1. 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo bco lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las/ nyan thos mtshon pa ste dang po rdzogs soMW1PD127393mdo, tsa641PD127523mdo sde
114b1

2. 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo bco lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las/ bsam gtan mtshon pa ste gnyis pa rdzogs soMW1PD127393mdo, tsa641PD127523mdo sde
121b7

3. 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo bco lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las/ than chen rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mtshon pa ste gsum pa rdzogs soMW1PD127393mdo, tsa641PD127523mdo sde
134b3

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hi Sh+Tha na sat+wa A lo ka na bud+d+ha k+she tra san dar sha na b+yu ha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ ban+d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur// bya ba'i rgyud sder gtogs so//
item.note: The short editorial comment at the end of the colophon is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang mtshan nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi gleng gzhi dang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang bshags pa'i le'u rnams 'byung ba nyi tshe bcos shing bsgyur ba
item.skttrans: A r+ya bud+d+ho ma hA sho d+ha ya pus ti sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang / 'gyod tshangs kyi le'u nyi tshe rdzogs so// //glegs bam mang po la gtugs te mtshan rnams ci nus bsabs so//
item.note: The short editorial comment at the end of the colophon is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya rat+na me g+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he bai ro tsa na ra k+Shi ta dang / d+har+ma tA shi las zhus te gtan la phab pa/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos lags so//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions different translators and revisers; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dz+nyA na ka sU tra bud d+ha a ba dA na
item.coloph: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyis mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra sing ha dang / sar+ba dz+nyA de wa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa
item.skttrans: sh+rI se na a ba dA nAM
item.coloph: rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+ma sh+rI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyur/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in smaller dbu can script: ma dpe ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa mul lto zangs dkar ras pa dang/ tog pa dge slong don grub lags so// bkra shis//.

item.tib: 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'dus pa chen po'i le'u las 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shI la dang / shI len dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The Tibetan title is taken from the colophon. The identification at the beginning of the text gives the name of a different text in both Sanskrit and Tibetan: rgya khar skad du/ Ar+ya ku sha la mu la saM pa ri gra ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo. Even though the folio is marked as belonging to volume tsha, at one point it was obviously confused with the first folio of volume mdo tha.

item.tib: 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya na ga ra A ba laM bi kA nA mahA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog+s so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid d+ya ka ra sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bra h+ma pa ri prid tsha nA ma mahA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya rat+na ko Tir nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa tshangs pa khyab par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bi she sha tsin ti b+rah+ma pa ri prid tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAk+ya pra b+ha dang / d+har+ma pA la dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he d+har+mA tA shI la dang / bar zhus kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he de ben drA shI la dang / ku ma ra shI la la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The names of the revisers differ slightly from D; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dru ma kin na rA dzA pa ri prid tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal gyi lhun po dang / ban+d+he dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: There is a slight difference in the phrasing of the title in D; S and V concur with Z. Missing folios: 349b and 350a, 409b and 410a.

item.tib: 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su bi kran ta tsi na ta de ba pu tra pa ri pri ts+tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa rgan po dang/ tog pa dge slong don grub red//; further note, in smaller dbu med script: bkris dpal 'bar dzaM ling rgyan du byon/.

item.tib: 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ak+Sha ya ma ti nir+de sha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'bum pa las/ blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he d+har+ma tA shI las zhus/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 2, 8-9.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru Na nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: There is a slight difference in the phrasing of the title in D; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsa tur+tha nir hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a bi kal+pa pra be sha nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bi ma la kIr ti nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he d+har+ma tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions a different translator and also specifies the length of the text; S and V concur with Z. Missing folios: 342b and 343a.

item.tib: sa'i mdo
item.skttrans: b+hU mi sU tra
item.coloph: sa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra war+ma dang / /zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The text is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: 'khar gsil 'chang ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: 'khar gsil 'chang ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa 'khar gsil gyi mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'khar gsil zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ka l+ya mi tra se ba na ma sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga tA nam bud+d+ha k+She tra gu No kta d+ha r+mA r+yA ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gsh+ye pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa don rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ar+tha bas+ti ro nA ma d+har+ma par+yA ya
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in dbu can script: ma dpe ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa sprang chung zangs dkar ras pa dang/ tog pa dge slong don grub yin lags//. Further, scribal note in smaller dbu can script by a different hand: yi ge 'bri byed a lci pa tshe ring rgya mtsho legs/.

item.tib: 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pU sta pA la prits+tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ sho lo ka stong ste/ bam po gsum dang sho lo ka brgya//
item.note: The colophon here differs slightly from the colophon of this text that is included in the dkon brtsegs section, Z50. Also the Sanskrit title differs slightly.

item.tib: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mahA pa ri nir+bA Na mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //sho lo ka sum stong brgyad brgya mchis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dz+nya na gar b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he de ba tsan dras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 218b and 219a.

item.tib: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: de'i phAng b+ya ba ph+hung po'u in kyeng su phim de'i ir
item.coloph: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya nag las bod du 'gyur ba la 'gyur gsar bcad ma byas pa'o//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar rdo rje mgon dang// tog pa dge slong don grub yin lags//.
item.note: While the title is indicated as Sanskrit or Indian origin, rgya gar skad du, it is obviously a Chinese title. Also the colophon denotes this as an unrevised translation from Chinese. The same phrasing is found in S and V but not in D. Missing folios: 323b and 324a, 339b and 340a, 364b and 365a, 396b and 397a.

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ta thA ga ta sang gI ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur cing / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: Missing folios: 136b and 137a.

item.tib: 'phags pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sam+b+ri ti pa ra mAr+tha sad+t+ya nir+de sha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAk+ya pra b+ha ba dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he d+har+ma tA shI la la sogs pa+s bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab//

item.tib: 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dri D+h+ya a ti shA ya pa ri ba r+to na ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+he dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+har+ma mu drA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //lo tsa ba ban d+he klu'i dbang po dang / lha'i zla bas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su kha ba ti b+yu ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya raSh+Ta pA la pa ra prits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra la sogs pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya lo kA nu bar+ta na nA ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ni ya ta a ni ya ta ga ti mu drA a ba ta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya b+ha ga ba te b+hai Sha dz+ya gu ru bai DUr+ya pra b+ha s+ya pUr+ba pra Ni d+ha na bi ste ra na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //mdo brgyad brgya pa nas bkol ba'o//
item.note: This text is also found in the rgyud section. There, it does not feature the short editorial comment at the end of the colophon, but instead the names of translators and revisers are provided.

item.tib: 'phags pa sA lu ljang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sha li s+tam b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sA lu ljang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa dpal sbas zhes bya ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya shrI gup ta nA ma sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpal sbas zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo bar tha dad pa thams cad la snang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: In D also the Sanskrit title is given. Also the Tibetan title differs slightly. D has a further comment at the end of the colophon not found in Z, S, or V.

item.tib: 'phags pa bdag med pa dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya nai rad m+ya pa r-i pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bdag med pa dri pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnas su skye ba blangs pa'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu ba'i lo tsa ba ban d+he pab stong dang / ban d+he shes rab seng ges rgya'i dpe las bsgyur//
item.note: The title is given in Chinese, rgya'i skad du: k+wan b+yi log pos zhong she te'u sh+wang then kyeng.

item.tib: 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tri sha rang na ga ma na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tram
item.coloph: 'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sar+ba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The title in D differs slightly in phrasing; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa
item.skttrans: e ka ga thA
item.coloph: tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi ba
item.skttrans: tsa tur ga thA
item.coloph: tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, zha (vol. 51), 291b5-292a3.

item.tib: 'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA lI ka pa ri pr-i ts+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: zas kyi 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa rdzogs so// //mo'u 'gal 'tsho ba'i mdo zhes pa de'o//
item.note: The title differs slightly from D. The editorial comment at the end of the colophon is not found in D, but it is also found in S and V.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya A ta dz+nyA na ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //dkar chag rnying par rgya las 'gyur bar bshad//
item.note: The editorial comment that points to a Chinese translation is not found in D, but it is also featured in S and V.

item.tib: mdo chen po stong pa nyid chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA shu n+yA tA nA ma mahA sU tram
item.coloph: mdo chen po stong pa nyid chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bka' dang por gtogs//
item.note: The short editorial comment at the end of the colophon is not found in D, but it is also included in S and V.

item.tib: mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba
item.skttrans: d+h+wa dza gran nA ma ma hA sU tram
item.coloph: mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: mdo chen po rgyal mtshan dam pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: d+h+wa dzA gra nA nA ma ma hA sU tram
item.coloph: mdo chen po rgyal mtshan dam pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: mdo chen po gzugs can snying pos bsu ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: bim bi sA ra prad t+yud ga ma nan nA ma ma hA sU tram
item.coloph: mdo chen po gzug+s can snying pos bsu ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa gnas 'jog gi mdo zhes bya ba
item.coloph: 'phags pa gnas 'jog ces bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sar+ba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bka' dang por gtogs/ glegs bam du ma la gtogs te zhus dag/
item.note: The editorial comment at the end of the colophon is not found in D, but it is also featured in S and V.

item.tib: 'phags pa me tog gi tshogs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ku su ma san tsa yA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa me tog gi tshogs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang / /zhu chen gyi lo tsa ban+d+he d+har+ma tA shI la la sogs pas zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//
item.volcoloph: Sanskrit phrases are added at the end of the colophon, in the same writing as the main text: oM badz+ra A yu She s+wA hA/ oM ye d+har+m+mA he tu pra b+ha wa he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya wa dat/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM wA dI mahA shra ma NaH s+wa hA/ oM sar+ba bid+yA s+wAhA/ oM su pra ti Sh+Tha badz+ra ye s+wa hA//. Further, a revision note in dbu can script by a different hand: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar ras pa dang/ tog pa dge slong don grub lags so//.
item.note: S features the same Sanskrit phrases at the end of the volume, which proves their close connection.

item.tib: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo
item.skttrans: d+har+ma tsa krA sU tra
item.coloph: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo rdzogs so// //thar pa lo tsas bsgyur ba dang / mdo'i ngo bo gcig tu snang//
item.note: The name of the translator and the editorial comment is not found in D, but it is included also in S and V.

item.tib: tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: shI la sa ma yug ga ta sU tra
item.coloph: tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dza ya ma ti ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //oM ye d+har+ma he tu pra b+ha wA he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to d+ya wa dat+ra/ te Shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI mahA shra ma Na s+wAhA//.
item.note: The inclusion of the ye dharmƒÅ formula, also found in S, suggests that this was copied from a collection that had the text placed at the end of a volume. The phrasing of the title differs slightly in D; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya A ba lo ki te sh+wa ra pa ri prits+tsha sa pat d+har+ma ka na nA ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa/ chos bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pang ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i mdo theg pa chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA sUr+ya mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i mdo theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos kyi yi ge
item.coloph: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi yi ge bam po'o// rdzogs so//

10b3

25a6

36b3

8. mdo 'dzin pa'i le'u'oMW1PD127393mdo, za691PD127528mdo sde

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na mu drA nA ma sa mA d+hi mahA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / mu ne wa r+ma dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folio: 84.

item.tib: 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mai tri pa ri pri ts+tsha nA ma mahA yA na sUt+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: sad d+ha r+ma rA dza ma hA yA na sUtra
item.coloph: dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i mdo rdzogs so// //sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i rnying pa skad gsar gyis ma bcos par snang //

item.tib: 'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya gar dang rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 127b and 128a.

item.tib: bslab pa gsum gyi mdo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shak+Shi tra ya nA ma sU tra
item.coloph: bslab pa gsum gyi mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa sku gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya kA ya tri nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sku gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po theg pa po'i mdo
item.skttrans: sad d+ha+rma rA dza mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: chos kyi rgyal po'i yi ge bam po gcig ste rdzogs so//
item.note: This is the same work as Z247, but perhaps in a different stage of revision.

item.tib: 'phags pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pany+tsa pA ra mi tA nir de sha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa pha rol tu phyin pa snga bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dA na pA ra mi ta nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA wa r+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.chap:
1. sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyan dang / spud pa dang / lhab lhab bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las le'u dang po'oMW1PD127393mdo, za691PD127528mdo sde
307b4

item.tib: 'phags pa ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a dza ta sha tru ko krid ta pra ti bi no da nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in smaller dbu can script: ma dpe ji ltar zhus dag pa/ 'brug rgya mtsho dang/ tog pa dge slong don grub lags//.
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Dala kan nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: In D, the title at the beginning of the text is phrased slightly differently; S concurs with Z. Missing folios: 2b and 3a.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi DI ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra b+ho d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 8-10.

item.tib: 'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dI pang kar b+yA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he dge dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ga r+bha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he klu'u rgyal mtshan gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa cen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya k+She ma tI b+yA ka ra na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mahA yA na pra b+ha ba na nA ma ma hA yA na sUt+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu bsgom pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas zhus shing bris te gtan la phab pa//
item.chap:
1. mtshan nyid rab tu dbyed pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'oMW1PD127393mdo, 'a701PD127529mdo sde
82b2

2. skye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gynis pa'oMW1PD127393mdo, 'a701PD127529mdo sde
95b4

3. rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'oMW1PD127393mdo, 'a701PD127529mdo sde
102a5

item.tib: 'phags pa ga ya mgo'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ga ya shir sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa ga ya mgo'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /ga ya'i rtse mo dang 'gyur khyad yin//
item.note: The short editorial comment at the end of the colophon is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug gtor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo le'u stong phrag bcu pa las le'u bcu pa
item.skttrans: b+ha ga ba no Sh+nI Sha mahA
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor chen po'o/ /le'u stong phrag bcu pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa/ don mngon par thob par spyod pa'i rgyu le'u bcu pa rdzogs so// //rgya las 'gyur ba'i brda rnying par snang //
item.note: The shot editorial comment that denotes this as an unrevised translation from Chinese is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: khams mang po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ba hu d+d+ha tu ka sUt+ra
item.coloph: khams mang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga ta pra ti bim ba pra ti Sh+Tha anu shang sa sam bar+na nA ma d+ha r+ma pa r+ya ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+ma ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bu d+hha a nu smri ti
item.coloph: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba d+ha r+ma pra brid ti nir de she nA ma ma hA na yA na sUtra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //lo tsa ba ban+d+he rin chen 'tshos bsgyur cing zhus/ glegs bam dum la gtugs te ci nus kyis zhus dag bgyis//
item.note: The editorial comment at the end of the colophon is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya s+t+rI bi bar ta b+yA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sing ha na di kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid d+yA ka ra sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he sba rje ye shes sdes snying pos bsgyur ba//

item.tib: 'phags pa srid pa 'pho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya b+ha ba sang krA na ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa srid pa 'pho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa/ glegs bam du ma la gtugs shing zhus dag ci lcogs bgyis//
item.note: The editorial comment at the end of the colophon is also found in S but not in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa za ma tog bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ka ra N+Ta b+yU ha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa za ma tog bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 312b and 313a.
item.chap:
1. 'di theg pa chen po'i mdo dkon mchog gi rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po rdzogs soMW1PD127393mdo, 'a701PD127529mdo sde
289b7

item.tib: 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a be bar+t+ya tsa kra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne wa r+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cig zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.volcoloph: Added in the same handwriting as the main text: oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/. Further, a revision note in smaller dbu can script by a different hand: ma dpe ji lta'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar bsam gtan chos 'phel dang/ tog pa dge slong ye shes 'phrin las lags//.
item.note: Missing folios: 405b and 406a.

item.tib: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su bar+na pra b+hA sa ud ta ma sU tra in+d+ra rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI la in+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: This longer version of the s≈´tra in 29 chapters is also included in the rgyud section, Z528. Also the shorter version of the s≈´tra in 21 chapters is featured twice, Z298 and Z529. As in S, only 3 bam po markers are given.

item.note: This work is not listed in this volume in V and L.

item.coloph: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: Missing folios: 29b and 30a, 43b and 44a. The colophon mentions the names of two more translators and revisers than D; S and V concur with Z.

item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: mdo sde snyan gyi gong rgyan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo

item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa. It is also not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, la (vol. 56), 138a5-165b6.

item.note: The third bam po marker is not found in S either.

item.tib: sangs rgyas shAk+ya thub pa la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa las lung bstan pa
item.coloph: sangs rgyas shAk+ya thub pa la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa las lung bstan pa rdzogs so//
item.note: As in S and V, there is no title at the beginning of the text. The Tibetan title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa
item.skttrans: bi ma la pra b+ha pa ri prits+tsha
item.coloph: theg pa chen po'i mdo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa'i mdo 'di shin tu dag par yod pas yid ches kyi gnas so/ /gzhan 'khrugs chad yod pa mang bar snang ste glegs bam mang du bltas so//
item.note: The editorial remark at the end of the colophon is also found in S but not in D.

item.tib: 'du shes bcu bstan pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: da sha sam dz+nyA de sha sU tra
item.coloph: 'du shes bcu bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: Text is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: stag rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa
item.skttrans: sha r+du la rna a ba dA na
item.coloph: 'phags pa stag rna'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAk+ya 'od kyis bsgyur//

item.volcoloph: Sanskrit phrases added at the end of the text: oM bud+d+ha ya d+hu/ oM badz+ra ya d+hu/ oM rat+na ya d+hu/ oM pad+ma ya d+ha/ oM kar+ma ya d+hu/ ye d+har+m+ma he tu pra b+hA wa he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba dat/ te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e wAM wA dI ma hA shra ma naH//. Further, revision note in dbu can script by a different hand than the main text: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhu dag pa / mu lto zangs dkar ras pa dang// tog pa dge slong don grub lags//.
item.note: No title is given at the beginning or end of the text. This work is not included in Tshal pa. The same Sanskrit phrases at the end of the volume are also found in S. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, a (vol. 60), 347b6-348a5.

item.tib: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sad d+har+ma smr-id t+yu pas+thA na
item.coloph: stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug pa 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung / /de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /de yi 'gog pa gang yin pa/ /dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/ /nye bar mkho ba thams cad legs par skrun pa lasogs pas phun sum tshogs pa'i dngos po mtha' dag dang ldan pa/ sa gzhi'i yon tan dang rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ /spyang zhing sgrin la skye bo thams cad blo dang ldan pas 'dzam bu'i gling yul rnams kyi mig tu dgongs nas/ ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni klung chen po 'bab pa chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram gyi bsdus pa ches yangs par gyur pa/ /rgya gar gyi yul lo de'i yang dbus su gtogs pa las shar gyi sha cha yul chen po shar phyogs pa len dra zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po ston pa'i bstan pa'i mig dang / rtsa ba dang / gzhir gyur pa dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i sras phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal gyis gzhan las mthos pas mnga' cher sgyur ba'i sa'i bdag po ne be'i pA la zhes bya ba'i mtho ris dang / thar pa'i them skas mkhas shing brtsun pa dul ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bzhugs gnas su mdzad pa'i gtsug lag khang dza gad dA lan mkhas pa'i skye dgu pan+Di ta rnams mang du byung shing / mang gis kyang chen po las chen por gyur pa lnga brgya pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten par sgrogs pa/ sngon gyi slob dpon chen po rnams dang mtshungs pa yin zhes bya ba'i bsngags pas pan+Di ta rnams kyis bsngags par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pas nga rgyal ba'i rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis lus kyi mgo ltar gnyan par khur ba/ mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can pan+Di ta'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyis gtsug gi nor bu ltar 'dzin pa/ tshe 'di ring du spangs pa'i skye bo thar pa bsgrub pa la brtson pa rnams kyis skyon yon legs par mthong bas lam 'dren pa'i mig dang 'dra bar lta ba/ yul gyi mi thams cad kyis bu gcig pa ltar snying du sdug pa'i 'thun par gyur pas/ dmu rgod lta bur log par sgrub pa rnams la ches 'thun par 'dzin pas yid 'phrog par mdzad pas 'gro ba nyam thag pa rnams gzigs nas/ brtse ba'i zug rngus sems gdungs kyang thugs rje'i phyag brkyang bas skal pa dang 'thun par rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa/ spyir lus bstan pa'i mdo sde stag rna'i rgyu skar las yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang / rtsom pa po chen po nyid dang / lus brjes nas mtho ris su skye ba bzhes pa/ lung bstan 'phags pa byams pa dang mjal bar bzhed pa'i sred pa dang chos kyi sred pa bla lhag pa mnga' ba/ chags sdang lasogs pa thams cad ni shas chung bar gyur pa'i skyes bu de'i bsngags pa spro bar ni sus nus/ mdor bsdu na/ 'jig rten mi chos kyi mkhyen pa che zhing bzang ba/ gser gyi sa bzhi dang 'dra ba la/ dam pa'i lha chos phun sum tshogs pa mkhas pa dang / brtsun pa dang zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / mnyen pa dang / nges pa dang / bden par smra ba/ g.yo med pa/ drang po'i rang bzhin can/ bsgrub pa la snying por mdzad pa'i dpag bsams kyi ljon shing lo 'dab rgyas pa g.yu'i man+Dal dang mtshungs par 'khrungs pa las/ tshe 'di dang / gzhan dang / gnas skabs dang / mthar thug pa'i dge ba'i lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu yongs su rgyas shing rnam par smin pas bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i pha rol tu phyin byon pas cung zad kyang don med pa ma yin pa/ rig pa'i gnas lnga la thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i dpal gyis mdzes pa'i pan+Di ta chen po shAn ta a ka ra 'gu pa ta 'i zhal snga nas dang / mkhas pa chen po skyes bu dam pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i yang mchog tu gyur pa pan+Di ta chen po Ar+ya a ka ra gu pa ta dang / thos pa 'dzin pas 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar grags pa spobs pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi sa mchog pan+Di ta chen po shAk+ya rak+Shi ta dang pan+Di ta chen po pa ri rdza A ka ra shAn ti la sogs pa rnams la rgya dpe lnga dang / gzhan yang yul dbus ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rten mang du bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas pa'i skye bo dkon mchog gsum la dad pas yul gang ba'i ma ga d+ha'i yul smad na/ rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de wa pA las mdzad pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po bstan pa'i mig tu gyur pa bri kra ma shI la na yang mkhas pa'i skye bo mang du zin kyang rak+Shi ta de nyid dang / sgra dang / snyan dngags dang / legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi lugs la mkhas pa'i pan+Di ta chen po su bu ti tsan+d+ra dang / mngon par la mkhas pa a Ti ta tsan tra lasogs pa rnams la rgya dpe gnyis la legs par mnyan cing gus pas thad du bsten nas don dang tshig ma lus par rtogs pa'i bshad pa zhugs nas/ shin tu dka' ba'i gnas rnams la ni phyi zhing legs par dpyad pas don dgrol ba'i thabs zhus te/ 'gyur gyi yan lag rgya gar gyi sang+k+ri ta dang / 'phral skad gnyis bod kyi chos skad dang 'phral skad gnyis te/ /bzhi la dbang 'byor pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba thob mod kyis kyang/ spyir mdo sde la don gyi gnas mang bas tshig don phal cher brnyings shing lhag par yang mdo 'di don du ma tshig zur rnams kyis ngag gcig tu 'brel bar ston pa ni tshig mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis don gsal bar mdzad pa snyan dngags kyi dbang phyug/ 'gran gyi do med pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa yin pa'i phyir na/ sbyangs pa zhan pa rnams la sla ba ma yin la/ khyad par du yang gzhung nyung bas don du ma stong pa'i mdun rol du ma bu rnams ni spyir sor bsgyur par mngon yang/ blo'i nor can rnams kyis ni de nyid la don du ma nges nus la/ bye brag tu gsal btab na ni don cig ston par 'khrul ba'i phyir dang / tshig ji tsam pas brjod pa de tsam du bsgyur bar rigs pa'i yang phyir te/ mdor na rgya bod kyi don thun mong pa brda tha dad pa'i byed pa ma nyams par byas nas/ sngon gyi bsgyur ba mkhas pa rnams kyis bkas bcad la sogs pa'i lugs dang yang mi 'gal bar byang phyogs pa tshab kyi rgyud du skyes pa'i dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis dam pa'i chos la gus pas/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dbang phyug gzhan bas ches mtho ba dang / ldan par mA ba la'i ring la/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba shas shing 'gyur ba 'phro yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bsgyur pa'o// //slad kyis zhu dag la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhang bu gcig pa zhes bya ba rab tu grags shing skye dgu rnams sgrogs pa yang / 'jig rten pa ni rang la phan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis brjod pa de dag rnams kyi gshis yin pa'i phyir te/ skyes bu des ni sems can la bu gcig pa la bzhin du dgongs pas sras gcig pa'o/ /des ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mtshon no/ /chos la gnas pa rnams shes rab 'od ces grags pa yang / theg pa'i rim pa dang mthun par mkhyen cing bden pa gnyis lasogs pa'i sgor bsdu ba dang / mos pa dang / nges pa dang / mngon du rtogs shing shes nas rang dang gzhan nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mun pa 'joms pa'i 'od mdzad pa'i phyir te/ des ni shes rab chen po dang ldan pa dang / bdag gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ dam pa'i skye bo des grogs mdzad nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan nyid kyis dag par byas so/ /de ltar na dang po'i gzhi 'gyur dang / zhu chen dang / tshig don gyi 'brel dpyad pa dang / zhu chung dang yang 'brel dpyad pa dang / lngas zhus shing gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o// dam chos mdo sde rin chen theg pa kun gyi gzhi dang rtsa ba bcud du gyur pa'i theg chen dran gzhag 'di/ legs bsgyur dngos dang grogs byed thams cad dang ni nam mkha' mthas gtugs 'gro kun dge ba dri med kyis/ /srid na bde sbyin skyabs gnas rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'bras ldan sa'i gnas skabs ljon shing lo 'dab phun tshogs shog /dang por tshe 'di brjes nas sangs rgyas zhing dag skye zhing 'khor tshe gzhan la phan pa 'ba' zhig byed par shog /bam po'i grangs su ni ma bcad do/ /gzhung tshad ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu rgya dpe rang la bzhugs so/ /yi ge'i brda sngon gyi rnying pa dang mi 'dra ba cung zad snang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shloo ka sum brgya la bam por bcad na brgya nyi shu'o//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of volume ki in dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar mul lto ba dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags//. Further, scribal note in smaller dbu can by a different hand: dga' bsod rnams kyi+s bris lags/ bkra shis/. Revision note at the end of volume khi in dbu can script: phyi mo ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa me g+ha s+wa ra sa mu dra dang / tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags//. Revision note at the end of volume gi in dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa mul lto zangs dkar 'brug rgya mtsho dang/ tog pa dge slong don grub lags//. Further, scribal note in smaller dbu can by a different hand: mdo sde gi pa slep tshe rin don grub kyi bris// //. Revision note at the end of volume ngi in dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa 'brug rgya mtsho dang/ tog pa dge slong ye shes 'phrin las lags//. Further, scribal note in smaller dbu can by a different hand: yi ge pa ni li gyir pa ring mo yin lags/.
item.note: Like in S, bam po markers are only indicated for the first two volumes. Missing folios in volume gi: 315; in volume ngi: 136b and 137a, 327b and 328a.

item.tib: gaN+Di'i mdo
item.skttrans: gaN+DI sU tra
item.coloph: gaN+DI'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha r+ma shrI bad tra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab ba//

item.tib: gaN+DI'i dus kyi mdo
item.skttrans: gaN+DI sa ma ya sU tra
item.coloph: gaN+DI'i dus kyi mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pam ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: tshe 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba zhus pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: A yuH ya tha b+hu tA gra ha sU tra
item.coloph: 'chi 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //bstan pa snga dar ba'i tshe 'gyur ba las skad gsar bcad kyis ma bcos pa'o//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, ci (vol. 65), 211a8-223a5.

item.tib: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA pa ri ni ra bA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, ci (vol. 65), 223a5-225b5.

item.tib: las gdags pa
item.skttrans: kar+ma pradz+nyA ba ti
item.coloph: las gdags pa bshad pa gsum pa rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa. It is also not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, ci, (vol. 65), 225b5-300a7.

item.tib: las rnam par 'byed pa
item.skttrans: kar+mA bi b+hang ka
item.coloph: las rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The colophon in D does not mention the names of translators and revisers. The text itself shows major textual differences compared to D.

item.tib: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su bar Na pra b+ha sod ta ma sU tren dra rA dza nA ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Revision and scribal note at the end of the volume in smaller dbu can script: phyi mo ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa sprang po zangs dkar ras pa dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags// yi ge pa ni li khir pa 'gang gis bris/ mang+galaM//.
item.note: Missing folios: 409b and 410a.
