item.tib: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i mdo
item.coloph: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing / gtsug lag gnyis la thugs legs par byang ba/ dpal 'byor dbang phyug dam pa dkar phyogs kyi zla ba ltar 'phel ba'i zha lu ba sku zhang grags pa rgyal mtshan du dben sha'i bka' lung gis byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i gdan las/ lho phyogs su dpag tshad drug brgya tsam bgrod pa'i gnas/ sing g+ha gling pa bram ze'i rigs las legs par rab tu byung zhing / bsnyen par rdzogs pa sde snod gsum la thugs legs par byang pa'i paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The first folio including the title is damaged.

item.tib: skyes pa rabs kyi gleng gzhi
item.skttrans: dzA ta ka ni dA naM
item.coloph: skyes pa rabs kyi gleng gzhi bshad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta a nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas dang / mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos /skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig//.

item.tib: lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo
item.skttrans: A TA nA Ti ya sU tra
item.coloph: lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig//
item.chap:
skabs rab mchog dang po'oMW1PD127393mdo, chi831PD127542mdo sde
96b6

skabs rab mchog gnyis pa steMW1PD127393mdo, chi831PD127542mdo sde
102b6

item.tib: 'dus pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: mahA sa ma ya sU tra
item.coloph: 'dus pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/ tshig 'dir yod kun sngar 'gyur dang mtshungs//
item.note: The editorial comment at the end of the colophon is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: byams pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: mai tri sU tra
item.coloph: byams pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/ /sngar 'gyur byams pa lung bstan dang don gcig//
item.note: The editorial comment at the end of the colophon is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: byams pa bsgom pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: mai tri b+hA ba na sU tra
item.coloph: byams pa bsgom pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig//

item.tib: bslab pa lnga'i phan yon gyi mdo
item.skttrans: pany+tsa shi k+Sh+yA nu saM sa sU tra
item.coloph: tshul khrims lnga'i phan yon bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ /skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/

item.tib: ri'i kun dga' bo'i mdo
item.skttrans: gi ri A nan+da sU tra
item.coloph: tshe dang ldan ri'i kun dga' bo'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: pha ma'i mdo
item.skttrans: pi tra ma tri sU tra
item.coloph: pha ma'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: las kyi rnam par 'gyar ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi gzhung bam po gcig
item.skttrans: kar+ma bi bang ka nA ma d+har+ma pa ri ya ya
item.coloph: las rnam par 'gyur ba bam po gcig pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: tshe'i mtha'i mdo
item.skttrans: A yu pa r+ya na ta sU tra
item.coloph: tshe'i mtha'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/ glegs bam du ma la gdugs nas zhus dag ci nus bgyis//

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya shi la ni k+Sha pa sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //lo tsa ba bzang skyong gis bsgyur/ dpal brtsegs kyis zhu chen bgyis//

item.tib: ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: pany+tsa pa ti ni kA ya shu b+hA shu b+ha pha la pha la pa rI k+Sha sU tra
item.coloph: ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya dz+nyA na shrI gup ta dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAk+ya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo
item.skttrans: ku mA ra dr-iSh+TAM ta sU tra
item.coloph: gzhon nu dpe'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nye dga' 'dul ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: nan+do pa nan+da nA ga rA dza da ma na sU tra
item.coloph: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nye dga' 'dul ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po A nan+ta shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig/

item.tib: 'od srung chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: mahA ka sh+ya pa sU tra
item.coloph: gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig /sngar 'gyur yod//
item.note: The colophon in D does not feature the names of translators and revisers nor the final editorial remark; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: nyi ma'i mdo
item.skttrans: sUr+ya sU tra
item.coloph: nyi ma'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig//
item.note: The colophon in D does not feature the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: zla ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: tsan+d+ra sU tra
item.coloph: zla ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig /snga 'gyur yang yo//
item.note: The colophon in D does not feature the names of translators and revisers nor the final editorial remark; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: bkra shis chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: mahA maM g+ha la sU tra
item.coloph: bkra shis chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAk+ya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig/ snga 'gyur yang yod//
item.note: The colophon in D is much more extensive; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya k+She mang ka ra pa ri prits+tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chan po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a na ba ta nA ga rA dza pa ri prits+tsha nA ma mahA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / ban+d+he ye shes sde dang / yi ge pa dgon gling rma la sogs pas zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 229b and 230a.

item.tib: gser mdog gi rtogs pa brjod pa
item.skttrans: su bar+Na a ba dA na ma
item.coloph: gser mdog gi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so// / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: ku na la'i rtogs pa brjod pa
item.skttrans: ku na la a pa da nA ma
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa; the colophon in Go provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: dpe'i phreng ba
item.skttrans: dri sh+Ta ta mA la
item.coloph: sangs rgyas mchog gi dpe ste dang po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur cing/ dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos nas zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: 'jig rten bzhag pa
item.coloph: 'jig rten bzhag pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since the first folio is missing. This work is not included in Tshal pa. Missing folios: 1, 22b and 23a, 44b and 45a.

item.tib: ched du brjod pa'i tshoms
item.skttrans: u dA na bar ga
item.coloph: ched du brjod pa'i tshoms dgra bcom pa chos skyob kyis bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / /lo tsa ba ban+d+he rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: mdzod dang 'jig rten brjod pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: ko Sha lo ka pradz+nya ba ti ka na tsa k+she ba
item.coloph: lo ka pradz+nya rdzogs so// //brda rnying du snang ngo//
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: rgyu gdags pa
item.skttrans: kA ra pradz+nya ba te
item.coloph: rgyu gdags pa rdzogs te gnyis pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi trA dang / pradz+nyA war+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa. Missing folios: 291b and 292a.

item.tib: dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa
item.coloph: dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa rdzogs so//
item.note: No formal opening. This work is not included in Tshal pa.
No formal opening and no title is given. This work is not included in Tshal pa Kanjurs. In the Derge Tanjur, this work is listed as li'i yul lung bstan pa.

item.tib: 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya nan da mi tra a ba d+hA ra Na ma nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong A dzi ta shI ra b+ha tra dang / dge slong shAk+ya 'od kyis bsgyur//
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i lo rgyus dang smon lam gyi mdo
item.skttrans: rA dza kA nyA pA hu dri pa s+ya pra kyi yu pra Ni d+ha sU tra
item.coloph: rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i smon lam gyi mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not included in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya b+ha dra tsa r+ya pra ni d+ha na rA dza
item.coloph: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mai tri pra Ni d+ha na
item.coloph: 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam rdzogs so//

item.tib: byang chub dam pa'i rjes su mos pa'i smon lam
item.coloph: byang chub dam pa'i rjes su mos pa'i smon lam rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam
item.skttrans: a gra cAr+ya pra ni d+ha nA na
item.coloph: mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba
item.coloph: 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba
item.coloph: rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not included in Tshal pa.

item.tib: bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
item.skttrans: s+wa s+t+ya ya na gA tha
item.coloph: bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa
item.skttrans: s+wa s+ti gA tha
item.coloph: bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyis tshigs su bcad pa
item.skttrans: pany+tsa ta thA ga ta mang ga la gA tha
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//

item.note: There is no indication of a title at the beginning or end of the text. In Skorupski 1985 and Bethlenfalvy 1982, this work is listed as bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa, according to the respective dkar chags. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, ji (vol. 67), 381b6-384b1.

item.tib: dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa
item.skttrans: rat+na tra ya s+wa s+ti ga thA
item.coloph: dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in slightly smaller dbu can script: phyi mo ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa mul lto ba zangs dkar ba dang// tog pa dge slong don grub lags//. Further, scribal note in dbu med: mdo sde 'jig rten gzhag pa 'di shar nges rdo rje bsod nams bdag gi bris.
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: mdo, ji (vol. 67), 384b1-384b5.

item.tib: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum ste rdzogs so// //rgyal mkhan po wang pham zhum dang / chos kyi gzhi 'dzin dge ba'i blo gros dang / lo tsa ba rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of volume kha in smaller dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa sprang po 'brug rgya mtsho dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags//. Revision note at the end of volume ga in smaller dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa mul lto ba 'brug rgya mtsho dang / tog pa dge slong ye shes 'phrin las lags//.
item.note: Volume ka is missing from the collection; the Tibetan title is taken from the colophon. The phrasing of the names in the colophon differs slightly in D. Missing folios in volume kha: 25-32; in volume ga: 151b and 152a.

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal bde mchog nyung ngu zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: tan+t+ra rA dza shri la g+hu saM ba ra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa rzdogs so// //rgya gar paN chen pa+dma kA ra dang //grags pa yid 'ong rgyal mtshan mtho ldan pa'i/ /rin chen dang mtshungs rin chen bzang po yis/ /mkhas pa pad+ma ka ra'i zhal sngar ni/ /rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe las bsgyur/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims dri yis bsgos gyur cing / /dri med dka' don 'thad pa dang bcas par/ /rtog pa dang ldan grags pa'i zhal sngar ni/ /sgra bsgyur dge slong pradz+nyA kir+ti dang / /mar pa sgra bsgyur chos kyi dbang phyug gis/ /mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas yul dbus kyi bla ma nA ro pa'i phyag dpe dang gtug+s pa'o//
item.note: Missing folio: 3.

item.tib: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: a bi d+ha na ut+ta ra tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po pad+ma ka ra shrI dz+nya na dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ phyis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang / /lo tsa ba khyung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus pa'o/ /phyis paN+Di ta A nan+ta dang / lo chung gis lhag chad rnams bsabs nas zhu dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//

47. bcud kyis len gyi rdzas kyi dbang du byas pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, ka881PD127547rgyud

item.tib: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI DA kAr+n+na ba ma hA yo gi ni tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: dpa' mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ /rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang / /ye shes dang / /sdom pa dang / /bya ba dang / /de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang / /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las 'di rnams dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzog so// //dpa' bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen po yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gar gyi paN+Ti ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus ding sang 'gran zla med pa/ /snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can/ /phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa/ /dpa' rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul reg pa shAk+ya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang / /bod kyi lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong d+har+ma yon tan gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o/ /phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang bstun te zhus gtugs legs par byas so/ /mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis/ /gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'/ /de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta cher zhugs nas/ /g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam/ /de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /kho bos gzhan don nus min na yang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur/ /'di la gzhung dang bla ma rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni/ /sgra don 'gal bar gyur pa bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs/ /'di las thob pa'i dge ba dri med cung zad des/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig /bdag gis srol btod tsam 'di la/ /sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyis/ /skad gnyis smras bas gzigs pa na/ /skyon du gyur snang bcos par zhu/ /phrag dog sgo nas mi 'phya zhing / /rjes su yi rang ba yang mdzod/ /rdzogs so//
item.chap:
1. ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ste 'di ni le'u dang po'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
7a4

2. rdo rje phag mo bskyed pa dang / gtso mo dang / /'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor sgom pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin 'di ni le'u gnyis pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
19a1

3. mkha' 'gro ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bde ba la kun tu spyod pa'i las kyi de kho na nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i cho ga ste le'u gsum pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
22a3

4. lA ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sngags dgod pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba drug la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ste le'u bzhi pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
25a6

5. dum skyes ma'i mtshan nyid dang / bskyed pa dang / 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i ming mdor bstan pa dang / /sngags dgod pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste le'u lnga pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
28a3

6. gzugs can ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang / gnas kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang / /rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u drug pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
30b5

7. kh+wa gdong ma la sogs pa'i srog bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u bdun pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

8. 'ug gdong ma'i nges pa'i tshul dang / /yang dag pa'i cho ga las bskyed pa dang / /srog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de le'u brgyad pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
35a8

9. kha gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang bde ba la sogs ma'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga ste le'u dgu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

10. phag gdong ma bskyed pa dang dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

11. gshin rje brtan ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
42a3

12. gshin rje pho nya mo bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'chi ba bslu ba'i 'khor lo sgom pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
44a4

13. gshin rje mche ba ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la 'jug pa 'chi ba slu ba la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
46a6

14. gshin rje 'joms ma 'jug pa bskyed pa dang / /dus su 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang / /sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin te le'u bcu bzhi pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
48b4

15. bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par gzhag pa dang man ngag sna tshogs bstan pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
64a5

16. rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
79b3

17. rdo rje sems dpa' dang phag mo'i go cha bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u bcu bdun pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

18. rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i go cha srung ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

20. he ru ka la sogs pa'i srung ba'i go cha'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

28. 'od ldan ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
98b7

29. sna chen ma'i mtshan nyid kyi brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
100a3

30. phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi ming zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

31. mi'u thung ma'i ge'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

32. lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya'i brda'i mtshan nyid dang / /dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang / /ming gi cho ga'i ye shes kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

33. shing grib ma'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
106b1

34. sa srungs ma'i sku'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
108a4

35. 'jigs byed chen mo'i nang gi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
109a3

36. rlung shugs ma'i kha dog gi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

37. chang 'thung ma'i rab tu sbyor ba'i brda'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
111b5

38. rdo rje phag mo dang gnyis su med pa'i ljang lha mo'i dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg dang / /'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
115b1

39. bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang shin tu bzang mo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can rta'i sngags mdor bstan pa rigs kyi klu'i las kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
117b4

40. rta rna ma dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas go cha dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi bsad pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
120a3

41. bya gdong ma dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i smyo bar byed pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i snying po'i sngags dang bcas pa'i las zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
121b7

42. 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'i rengs par bya ba'i las dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud

43. dum skyes ma'i rab tu sbyor ba sgom pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskrad pa'i las rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
125b2

44. chang 'tshong ma'i rab tu sbyor bar dbye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi cu rtsa bzhi pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
127a2

45. 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i lkugs par bya ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang / /'khor lo sgom pa dang / /dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor srid mo'i rnam par 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
129a4

46. shin tu dpa' mo'i zhi ba'i las kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo sgom pa dang gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi las tshogs zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
131a3

47. stobs chen ma'i sbyor bas srung ba chen po phur bu'i sngags kyi las byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul 'khor sgom pa'i man ngag gi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
132a4

48. 'khor los sgyur ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pa las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo sgom pa'i lam dang / /rdza rnga'i sngags mdor bstan pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
134b8

49. brtson 'grus chen mo'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsang ba'i bcud len la sogs pa dang / /rgyas pa'i las dpal yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin he ru ka'i rtsa'i sngags kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
139a7

50. de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang chen thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u lnga bcu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
182a2

51. bstod pa dang mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, kha891PD127548rgyud
183b1

item.tib: dpal bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA saM ba ro da ya tan+t+ra rA dza s+ya nA ma
item.coloph: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud chen po 'bum pa las/ /lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba'i rtogs pa las btus pa/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gsang ba bklags pas 'grub pa/ /dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //shes rab dman zhing sbyangs pa chung mod kyi/ /rgyud kyi gzhung la dad pa brtan skyes pas/ /rang don tsam du bsgyur ba gang lags pa/ /'phags dang mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa mdzod/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhan la phan pa mtha' yas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba rgyus ban de smon lam grags kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The colophon in D adds a further editorial remark not found in Z or S.

item.tib: rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor gyi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: tsa tur yo gi nI saM pu Ta ta n+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// /dpal in d+hi pa na las nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las/ /'jigs rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyal po rdo rje slob dpon dpal in+d+ra b+hU ti'i zhabs kyis bkod cing gsal bar mdzad pa'o/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba la chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur te/ /slad kyis de nyid kyi tshe paN+Di ta gnyis la yang dag par gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba
item.skttrans: ba dzra bA ra hi a b+hi da na
item.coloph: bshad pa'i rgyud phyi ma las phag mo mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / /zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: In D, a much more extensive title is given at the beginning of the text.

item.tib: rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs
item.coloph: rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dza ya se nA'i zhabs dang / /lo tsa ba btsun pa d+har+ma yon tan gyis bsgyur pa'o//
item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since it is missing at the beginning of the text. D also provides a Sanskrit title. Compared to the version in D, a portion at the beginning of the text is missing. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but the end of the text is found in L: rgyud, kha (vol. 72), 383b5.

item.tib: yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po
item.skttrans: saM pu Ta nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra
item.note: The text ends without colophon. In the catalogue of S, the following text was still considered part of this text.

item.tib: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA yas+tha pa ga ya d+hA ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad nas yang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gzhan rnams kyis bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas rang gi ming bcug cing / gzhan gyi ming 'phyi ba de dag dang / mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir slad nas yang rgya gar gyi rgyud bzhi dang / dge slong shAk+ya ye shes de nyid kyis gtugs nas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since the formal opening of the text is missing. In Skorupski 1985, this text was considered part of the previous one; in the manuscripts of S, it starts at rgyud, kha, 412b1. It is also not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, ga (vol. 73), 91a2-117a5.

item.tib: dpal gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI guh+ya badz+ra tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta rat+na badz+ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sar+ba ts+tshin+da tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI tsa kra saM ba ra gu h+ya a tsin+t+ra tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI kha sa ma tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis zhus shing bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA kha sa ma tan+t+ra rAd za
item.coloph: dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI kA ya bAk+tsit+ta tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shA kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI rat+na mA le tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal rin chen 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po gsang ba yang gsang ba ste rang bzhin gyis gsang rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang / /lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slad kyis kyang dpe phyi mo la gtugs nas bcos pa'o//

item.tib: dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA sa ma ya tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI ma hA ba la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma

item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in smaller dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus pa zangs dkar pa mu lto ba 'brug rgya mtsho dang / tog pa don grub lags// dga'o//.
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, ga (vol. 73), 154a4-155b5.

item.tib: dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI dz+nyA na dz+wa la tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang cher gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// //sing ga gling gi rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.note: The phrasing in the colophon differs slightly in D; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po

item.tib: dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba

item.tib: dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba

item.tib: dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI dz+nyA na gar+b+ha nA ma yo gi nI ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA ya de rA dza
item.coloph: dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba'o/ /dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma'i phyi ma'o//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, ga (vol. 73), 343a2-350a6.

item.tib: dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI tad tA pra dI paM nA ma ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po mchog chen po rmad du byung zhing / rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pradz+nyA shrI gup+ta bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /dus phyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas so//

item.tib: dpal sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI bud+d+ha ka pA la nA ma yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 310b and 311a.

item.tib: sngags kyi cha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: maN+t+ra aM sa tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: gdan bzhi pa las yang dag par btus pa/ sngags kyi cha'i rgyud bshad pa sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lhas btsas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.volcoloph: The end of the volume features a line in Lantsa script, together with an accordant transliteration in dbu can: d+ha r+ma s+ya rA dza sU r+ya bi dza mU r+ti sa pa ri wA ra s+ya a yu shrI pu N+ye b+ho ga d+h+r-i ka d+ha na Sh+tsa ba r+d+ha naM ku r+ba n+tu. A further line in dbu med translates the text: chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma rnaM rgyal sku 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshe dpal bsod naMs mnga' thang nor longs spyod 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/. Further, also in dbu med script, the revisers are mentioned: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar mul lto ba dge legs nor bu dang/ tog pa dge slong ye shes 'phrin las lags/. Below is added a verse in dbu med: sde tshan bdun pa'i gsuM pa la/ a li gsuM pa sbyar ba la/ rjes 'jug dgu pa'i rten byas pa/ skye yul ming du ldan pas bris//.
item.note: D gives a more extensive title at the beginning of the text; S and V concur with Z. Note that also S features a line in Lantsa at the end of the volume.

item.tib: rnal 'byor ma thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI tsa tur pI tha ma hA yo gi nI gu h+ya sarba tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ /s+m+ri ti dz+nyA na kir+tis gsar du bsgyur te bshad cing gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: In D, the title at the beginning of the text is phrased differently; S concurs with Z. The colophon in D is much more extensive; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: dbang mdor bstan pa
item.skttrans: Sha ko ta da sha
item.coloph: dbang gi sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs so// //'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'bro dge slong shes grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ /slar yang rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/ dpal nA ro pa'i 'grel bshad dang mthun par bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas pa'o//

item.tib: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las byung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: pa ra ma A di bud+d+ha ud d+h+ri ta shrI kA la tsa kra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: mchog gi dang po'-i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / /bod kyi lo tsa ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhuis te gten la phab pa las/ /dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / dpon chen shAk+ya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du/ /mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi chan la legs par dpyad cing bskul te/ legs par sbyor ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong ston gyis/ dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/ /gang gis thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis/ /'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang/ /bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gang thob des/ /kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog//

item.note: In D, the title at the beginning of the text is phrased slightly differently; S concurs with Z. Also the phrasing of the colophon in D is slightly different.

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag tshal ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bstod pa

item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since no title is given at the beginning of the text. The colophon in D is different; S and V concur with Z. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, nga (vol. 74), 334b6-336a7.

item.tib: rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu
item.skttrans: badz+ra kI la ya mU la taN+t+ra khaN+Da
item.coloph: rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dngos kyi rgya dpe dang 'thun par dpal ldan sa skya paN+Di tas/ g.yas ru'i sa'i cha shangs kyi sreg zhing du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: ma hA kA la tan+t+ra rA dzA na ma
item.coloph: ldang 'phrul gyi gtsug lag khang chen po ra sa ra mo cher pha rgyal khams pas zhus pa'i don du/ paN+Ti ta chen po sa man+ta shrI dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ra dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: yA thA lab+d+ha kha sa ma tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: ji lta ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po k+Sha ka ga Na dang / lo tsa ba mang 'or dge slong byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: shrI gu h+ya sa ma dza ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang/ thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra war+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI dz+nyA na ka ra bas bshad nas/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis zhus gtugs g.yar khral du 'tshal ba'o/ /'dus pa'i rtsa brgyud la lo chen gyis bsgyur ba mang du snang na'ang / 'gos kyis 'gyur mdzad pa nyung bar snang la/ 'grel pa'i bshad pa 'gos 'gyur gyi steng nas byed pa la rgyud kyi 'gog 'gyur gal che bar mthong nas bris pa'o//
item.note: In Skorupski 1985 as well as Pagel and Gaffney 1996 this and the subsequent text are counted as a single work.

item.tib: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa
item.skttrans: tsa tur de bi pa ri prits+tsha
item.coloph: thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa dpal aur+yan gyi yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan sm+ri ti dz+nyA na kir+ti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o//
item.chap:

item.tib: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: badz+ra dz+nyA na sa mu ts+tsha ya nA ma tan+t+ra
item.coloph: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// //rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba khu ston dngos grub gyis bsgyur/ slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o/ /ye shes rdo rje kun las btus/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin/ /ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo 'o/ /de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste/ /kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus/ /de ston pa la der brtags nas/ /gzhung la'ang ming don 'tshams pa yin//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badz+ra h+ri da ya a laM kA ra tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud rnal 'byor chen po'i de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba dpal aur+yan gyi gsan ba'o dgon pa nas byung ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po mnga bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
item.coloph: 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //mkhan chen thar pa lo tsa ba'i phyag dpe'i gseb nas shog yar lnga byung ba sngar bsgyur ba las/ phyis nyang stod smon bgro'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad nas/ bu ston gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan no/ /rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yis/ /chos min sun dbyung bya phyir dang / /dam tshig snang ba spel ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags/ /'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang / /rgya dpe'i dpe dpang ma rnyed cing / /don zab sgra ni rtogs dka' la/ /saM s+kr+i ta la ma byang bas/ /sgra don ji bzhin ma 'byor ba'i/ /nongs de mkhas rnams bzod mdzad cing / /phyis 'byung skad gnyis smra rnams kyis/ /ma dag shes na bcos par zhu/ /rgyud chen 'di ni bsgyur ba las/ /dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa/ /de yis mtha' yas 'gro ba kun/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid gyur cig//
item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since a larger part of the text at the beginning is missing; the same situation is found in S. The colophon in D is much more extensive; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: Ar+ya nI lAm ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni ru dra tri bI na tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pu N+ya ma ti dang / lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: badz+ra h+ri da ya badz+ra dzi hA nA ha nA ma d+ha ri NI
item.note: Missing folio: 417b. The missing folio also includes the end of the text.

item.tib: dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //lo tsa ba dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.note: Missing folios: 417b and 418a. The missing folios also include the beginning of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon. The colophon in D has a different phrasing and mentions a further translator; S and V concur with Z. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, ca (vol. 75), 375a4-376b5.

item.tib: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
item.skttrans: many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na sa t+wa s+ya pa ra mAr+tha na saM gI ti
item.coloph: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las byung ba/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAk+ya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so// //thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor ba'i bdag nyid chen po bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gling gis dben gnas su bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa'o/ /sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen po de dag gis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur zhing kun la grags lags mod/ /'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du/ /rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur//
item.note: The colophon in D is more extensive and has a different phrasing; S and V concur with Z.

item.note: The colophon in D is phrased slightly differently; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI badz+ra mahA b+hai ba ra ba nA man+t+ra
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus nas phyung ba rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyis dngos grub pa'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //dpal au r+yan gyi gnas chen po nas dpal 'jam dpal gyi rgyun las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po zhes bya ba bla ma dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal lA li ta badz+ras bton nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi zhal snga nas dang / /bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
item.note: D differs slightly in the phrasing of the title; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga
item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga'o// rdzogs so//
item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since there is no formal opening. The text corresponds to the first section, rtog pa dang po, of D469. This is not listed as a separate work in Skorupski 1985 or Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in the respective Kanjurs. Stog: rgyud, cha (vol. 97) 113a6-116b4; London: rgyud, cha (vol. 76), 97b2-100a1.

item.coloph: rdzogs so//
item.note: The text corresponds to the third section, rtog pa gsum pa, of D469. This is not listed as a separate work in Skorupski 1985 or Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in the respective Kanjurs. Stog: rgyud, cha (vol. 97) 116b4-117b6; London: rgyud, cha (vol. 76), 100a1-101a6.

item.tib: dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga
item.coloph: dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//
item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since there is no formal opening. The text corresponds with the second section, rtog pa gnyis pa, of D469. This is not listed as a separate work in Skorupski 1985 or Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in the respective Kanjurs. Stog: rgyud, cha (vol. 97) 117b6-118b1; London: rgyud, cha (vol. 76), 101a6-100b6.

item.tib: gtam rgyud kyi rtogs pa
item.coloph: gtam rgyud kyi rtogs pa rdzogs so//
item.note: In Skorupski 1985, the details of this work include also the preceding text and should be corrected to rgyud, cha (vol. 97), 118b1-119a4. In Pagel and Gaffney 1996, this work is not listed, but it is found in L: rgyud, cha (vol. 76), 100b6-101b6.

item.tib: gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i 'khor lo las thams cad 'grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: ya mA ri kr-iSh+Na kar+ma sar+ba tsak+ra sid+d+hi ka ra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: gshin rje gshed nag po'i las thams cad grub par byed pa'i 'khor lo'i rgyud/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI badz+ra b+hai ra bA kal+pA tan+t+ra rA dzA
item.coloph: dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyi dngos grub brtag pa bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po a mo g+ha'i zhabs nus pa can dang / /bod kyi lo tsa ba mar pa ban d+he chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /slad kyis grub thob chen po kar+Na shrI'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ /thar pa lo ts+tsha ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.coloph: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //yon tan mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po che'i bka' lung gis/ /dpon chen kun dga' bzang pos yon bdag byas pa'i dus na/ /kha che'i paN+Di ta ra hu la shrI b+ha dra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong blo brtan gyis/ /dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o//
item.note: The colophon of D points to a different translation; S and V concur with Z. There are substantial differences between Z and D also on the textual level.

item.tib: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: shrI b+ha ga bA na a ka dza Ta ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa rtag pa rdo rje'i rgyud chen po bla na med pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi t+ra A nAM dA'i bka' drin la brten nas/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po badz+ra shrI kha la ru tra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dpal zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: shrI tsan+d+ra gu h+ya ti la ka nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// //lo tsa ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis/ lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la/ ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/ sems can sems bde thob par smon//
item.note: The folio numbers 261-263 are lacking, but there is no gap in the text.
item.chap:

295b7

4. rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, cha931PD127552rgyud
306a4

5. de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, cha931PD127552rgyud
315a8

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: sar+ba ta thA ga ta ta t+wa saM gra ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The colophon in D shows major differences; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo
item.skttrans: badz+ra shi kha ra ma hA gu h+ya yo ga tan+t+ra
item.coloph: gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po kar+ma badz+ri'i zhal snga nas dang / /lo tsa ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /bam po bcu gnyis pa'o//

item.tib: thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: sar+ba ra ha s+yo nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma kA ra bar+ma dang / /zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: trai lok+ya bi dzA ya mahA kal+pa rA dza
item.coloph: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po kun rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtags pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: sar+ba dur+ga ti pa ri sho d+ha na te dzo rA dza ta thA ga ta ar+ha te sam+yak+saM bud+d+ha s+ya kal+pa nA ma
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn ting gar+b+ha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus/ A tsAr+ya rin chen mchog gis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: sar+ba dur+ga ti pa ri sho d+ha na te dzo rA dza s+ya ta thA ta s+ya ar+ha te sam+yag saM bud+d+ha s+ya kal+pa e ka da sha nA ma
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po re ben dra de ba'i zhabs dang / bla ma paN chen skyes bu chen po mA Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gus par mnyan te/ chag lo tsa ba shAk+ya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ spre'u lo dbyug gu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum la/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thang po cher dbu btsugs nas/ smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'i bar zhag bco lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'dren gyi lha'i sdings su tshar bar bgyis so/ /dpal ldan rgyud rgyal ngon song sbyong ba yi/ /brtag pa phyogs gcig sngar grags kha che nas / /chos rgyal sku drin paN chen sgra bsgyur mchog /skyes chen rnams kyis legs par dar bar mdzad/ /'di ni dpal ldan kun dga' snying po dang / /rje btsun 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa yi/ /man ngag la brten rgya gar bal po na/ /yongs grags bla ma'i drin las kho bos bsgyur/ /sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsung bzhin du/ /gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams/ /bzod mdzod de dges 'gro ba kun/ /'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur cig /bkra shis par gyur cig/

item.tib: rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga'i rgyud
item.skttrans: saM k+She pa pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: mngon spyod kyi las
item.coloph: mngon spyod kyi las rdzogs so// //rgya gar mkhan po shAn+tiM gar+b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba'o//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in dbu can script: ma dpe bzhin du zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa dge legs nor bu dang/ tog pa dge slong ye shes 'phrin las lags so// dge'o//.
item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since there is no formal opening. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, ja (vol. 77), 336b5-337a6.

item.tib: dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
item.skttrans: shrI pa ra mA di nA ma ma hA yA na kal pa rA dza
item.coloph: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya shrAd d+hA ka ra bar+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: dpal mchog dang po'i sngags kyi rtog pa'i dum bu zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dpal mchog dang po las/ /rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs so// //thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling du rgya gar gyi mkhar po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po mant+ra ka la sha dang / sgra bsgyur lo tsa ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ lo tsa chen po rin chen bzang po yi/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la/ /bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas/ /bdag gis 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur//
item.note: The title is taken from the colophon since there is no formal opening of the text.

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+tsa da sha ka
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: shrI badz+ra maN+Da a laM kA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// /rigs gzugs skal bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs/ /phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs pa/ /dpal ldan blos brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur//
item.note: Missing folios: 279b and 280a, 285b and 286a.

item.tib: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: shrI badz+ra maN+Da a lang kA ra nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// /rig+s gzug+s skal bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs+/ /phun tshog+s ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzog+s pa/ /dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur/ /'di lo tsa ba bu ston kha ches 'gyur bcos pa der snaM ba+s sngar gyi 'gyur dang mi 'dra ba'i khyad chen po gda' 'o//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in small dbu can script: ma dpe ji ltar zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa dkon mchog yar 'phel dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags//.
item.note: The final editorial remark at the end of the colophon is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pany+tsa bing sha ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D has a further editorial remark added.

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: sar+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA k+tsit+ta gu h+ya a lang+kA ra b+yU ho tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang // thugs gsang ba brgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gsheg+s pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / bsgyur byed kyi mkhas pa sgra'i gzhung lugs la blo gros dkar ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur/ /mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gi /dregs pa'i dra ba rnam par dral ba'i phyir/ /rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i rgyal po ltar zab 'di/ /brgyur la 'gal gang 'di la 'phags rnams dgongs//

item.tib: 'phags pa gsang ba nor bu thig le zhes bya ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya gu h+ye ma Ni ti la ka nA ma sU tra
item.coloph: mchog tu gsang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sbas pa'i mchog gi thig le zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i 'byung gnas rdzogs so// //dam pa'i rgyud 'di gangs can 'di na sngon / rnam pa kun tu bsgyur ma rnyed/ /mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal dang ni/ /sgra rig kun dga' rgyal mtshan bdag gis bsgyur/ /dam pa'i bkas bskul nas ni gus pa yis/ /dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur/ /dge ba de yis sems can thams cad kyis/ /gsang don rtogs nas sangs rgyas sar 'gro shog//

item.tib: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa shin tu rgyas pa mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: ma hA bai ro tsa na a b+hi saM bo d+hi bi kur+bi ta a d+hi Sh+ThA na bai pu l+ya sU tren+da rA dza nA ma d+har+ma pa r+yA ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyal po gsang ba mchog gi rim par phye ba las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po byin gyis rlob pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The following colophon is found in the middle of the text, f.228b8-f.229a3: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ /gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i cho ga ji snyed par rim par phye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong dpal brtsegs ra k+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//. This is also found in S and V but not in D.

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba de'i stobs dpag tu med pa rtul phod pa 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a tsa la ma hA kro d+ha rA dza s+ya sar+ba ta thA ga ta s+ta ta s+yA sa pa ri mi ta ba la pa ra kra ma sa bai nas+ta b+ha Shi to nA ma kal+paH
item.coloph: 'phag+s pa khro bo'i rgyal po chen po mi g.yo ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pas 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //mi nyag rgyal po'i bka' lung gis rgya gar gyi mkhan po ush+ma rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas/ glan dge slong d+har+ma blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ dge slong yon tan rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa'o// //phyis su'ang chos kyi rgyal po bkra shis rab brtan dpal bzang po'i bka'i bskul ba bzhin/ lo tsa ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya'i dpe la legs par gtugs te gtan la phab pa dang / slar yang mi'i dbang po bkra shis rab brtan sog po 'phags kyi zhal snga nas kyi sku ring la/ dge slong A nan+da mang+ga laM gyis/ dpal 'khor bde chen gyi gtsug lag khang du/ bi ka ma la shI la'i gtsug gi rgya dpe la gtugs nas/ mi 'chos su mi rung ba rnams legs par bcos te dag par bgyis pa'o//
item.volcoloph: Revision and scribal note at the end of the volume in smaller dbu can script: ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa bsam gtan chos 'phel dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags so// yi ge'i 'du byed kar+m+ma tshe ring gis bgyis// bkra shis//.
item.note: Missing folios: 312, 354b and 355a.

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni a b+hi She ka ma hA tan+t+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 61, 87.

item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya rdzogs so// / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar gcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la 'phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya b+ha ga ba te b+hai Sha dz+ye gu ru bai DUr+ya pra b+hA sa pur+ba pra Ni d+ha na bi she Sha bi s+tA ra na ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas zhus shing bsgyur te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga ta bai DUr+ya pri b+hA nA ma ba la d+ha na sa mA d+hi d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / su ren+d+ra bu d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hi paM ka ra shri dz+nyA na dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas tho ling gser khang du skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The final part of the colophon is missing in Skorupski 1985, but it is identical with Z.

item.tib: sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gtab pa
item.coloph: sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gtab pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The formal opening of the text is missing; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.coloph: dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las thun mos gi rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-i Sh+Na paN+Ti dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.coloph: rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na h+ri da yA gu h+ya d+hA tu ka raN+Da mu drA nA ma d+hA ra Ni mahA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he btsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Missing folios: 2b and 3a.

item.tib: byang chub kyi snying po rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs
item.skttrans: bo d+hi gar+b+hA lang+kA ra lak+Sha d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+wA da sha bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sap+ta bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba bud+d+ha aM ga ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bud+d+ha h+ri da ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni d+har+ma par+yA ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.skttrans: Ar+ya puSh+pa ku Ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phag+s dri med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsan dan aM ga nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pra ti t+ya sa mut+pA da pa ri hr-i da ya d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da nA ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dz+nyA nol+ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni sar+ba ga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mA hI mA hen+t+rA nA nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa sa'i dbang po chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: rdzogs so//

item.tib: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo
item.coloph: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening at the beginning of the text; the title is taken from the colophon. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, da (vol. 81), 43b1-43b5.

item.tib: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ya nan+ta mu kha ni hA ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya Sha Ta mu khi nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba d+har+ma gu Na b+yU ha ra dzA nA ma hA yA na s+wA tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA ba+rma dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rigs sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA ra Ni bid+yA rA dza
item.coloph: 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa gzungs chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa gzungs chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya s+wa la pa a k+Sha ra pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po
item.skttrans: b+ha ga ba ti pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA hr-i da ya
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
item.coloph: ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shak+ya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa shAk+ya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text lacks a formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa
item.coloph: snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The text lacks a formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa
item.coloph: zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The text lacks a formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The text lacks a formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa
item.coloph: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The text lacks a formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: pU dza me g+ha nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phag+s pa pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: su ru pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: su rU pa nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a Sh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA ra NI nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya be sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mU la tan+t+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //dpal lha btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po ku mA ra ka sha dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAk+ya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
