item.tib: stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: ma hA sa ha sra pra mar+da na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /slar yang rgya dpe la gtugs nas dag par byas so//
item.note: The colophon in D is different, much more extensive, and provides the names of translators and revisers; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo
item.skttrans: ma hA mA yU rI bid+ya rA dz+nyI
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das ma rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang / shAk+ya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya dpe la gtugs nas zhus dag byas shing sngags rnams rgya dpe dang mthun par bcos pa'o//
item.note: The final editorial remark in the colophon is not found in D; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: a r+ya ma yU ra bid+ya gar+b+he nA ma
item.coloph: rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mahA pra ti sa ra bi d+ya rAdz+nyI
item.coloph: 'phags pa rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i bsrung ba'i cho ga'i brtag pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o/ /slar yang yul dbus kyi rgyang pa gnyis dang bstun nas sngags rnams dag par bu ston lo ts+tsha chen pos bcos pa la phyi mo//
item.note: In the colophon of D, the final remark about the further revision of the text differs and lists other names; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: bsil ba'i tshal chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: ma hA shi ta ba ni ka su tra
item.coloph: bsil tshal gyi mdo chen po rdzogs so/ /sngags rnams yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis dang bstun nas/ bu ston lo ts+tsha ba chen pos dag par bcos so//
item.note: The colophon in D differs and lists the names of other translators and revisers.

item.tib: gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: ma hA man+t+ra a nu d+hA ri sU tra
item.coloph: gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang / shAk+ya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o/ /slar yang bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas rgya dpe zhal mthun du bsags pa la gtugs nas hor khong cung zad las pa rnams bsgyur/ sngags rnams dag par bgyis pa'o//
item.note: In the colophon of D, the final remark about a further revision by Bu ston is not mentioned; S concurs with Z. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, na (vol. 82), 484b7-492a7.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mahA san+ni pa ta rat+na ke tu d+hA ra Ni nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzung+s rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi len+d+ra bo d+ha dang / dzI na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions fewer translators and revisers; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mA rI ts+ye nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur pa'o//

item.tib: sgyu ma'i 'od zer can 'byung ba'i rgyud las phyung ba rtog pa'i rgyal po
item.coloph: sgyu ma'i 'od zer can 'byung ba'i rgyud las phyung ba rtog pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du ji snyed pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The formal opening of the text is missing, hence the title is taken from the colophon. In Skorupski 1985, this work was seen as part of the following text. Missing folio: 146.

item.tib: 'od zer can 'byung ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las mchog tu shin tu'ang snying por gyur pa'i 'od zer can gyi stong pa brgya phrag bdun pa phyung ba
item.coloph: 'od zer can 'byung ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las mchog tu shin tu'ang snying por gyur pa'i 'od zer can gyi stong pa brgya phrag bdun pa phyung ba rdzogs so//
item.note: The formal opening of the text is missing, hence the title is taken from the colophon. In Skorupski 1985, this work was seen as part of the preceding text.

item.tib: 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po rgyal ba can zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dza ya ba nI ma mahA bid+yA rA dzA
item.coloph: 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dza ya ba tI nI nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzung+s rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya hi ra N+ya ba tI nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa dug sel ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dzaM gu li nA ma bid+ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa dug sel ba ces bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so//

item.tib: bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo
item.skttrans: sid+d+hi pa thi ta b+ha ga bAn Ar+ya aM gu li nA ma bid+yA rA dz+nyai
item.coloph: bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba d+har+ma mA tri ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsu DA ma Ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The colophon is not provided in Skorupski 1985, but it is present in the manuscript.

item.tib: 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags
item.skttrans: Ar+ya Sha Ta k+Sha ra bid+ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta sa ha sra d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs
item.coloph: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: pha rol tu phyin pa drug bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: pha rol tu phyin pa drug bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: tshad med pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: tshad med bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+h+yo//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa phal po che tshe bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa phal po che tshe bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po
item.coloph: 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa so sor 'brang ma chen mo bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: There is no formal opening of the text, hence the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa
item.skttrans: sar+ba ta thA ga toSh+NI sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni kal+pa sa hi ta
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzung+s rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba dur+ga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa
item.skttrans: sar+ba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni kAl+paM hi ta
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chos kyi sde dang / khams pa lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rtog pa
item.skttrans: sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza yA nA ma d+hA ra Ni kAl+pa
item.coloph: rtog pa 'di yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdom brtson dam pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la zla med par smra ba ne'u mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba gnas brtan dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur pa'o//

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa
item.skttrans: sar+ba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni kal+pa sa ha ta
item.coloph: 'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtogs pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pa (vol. 83), 216a1-217b1.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gsh+ye pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa trE na ma a pa rA dzI tA pra t+yaM gi ra mahA bid+yA rA dzi
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre a pa ra dzi ta mahA prat+yaM gi ra pa ra sid d+hi nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.note: Missing folio: 264b, including the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gsh+ye pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: Missing folios: 264b and 265a, including the beginning of the text. The title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ta thA ga to uSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre nA ma a pa ra dzi ta d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //gtsug tor lha yul ma chung ba kha che'i paN+Di ta mahA dz+nyA nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//

item.tib: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: sa man+ta mu kha pra be sha ra sh+ma bi ma loSh+NI Sha pra b+ha sa sar+ba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki te nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: shes pa thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: sar+ba ma na an+ta mi ta sid+d+his+tu pe nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.note: The formal opening and ending of the text is missing. In Skorupski 1985 and Pagel and Gaffney 1996, this is not identified as a separate text, but taken to be part of the preceding text.

item.tib: 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ra s+mi bi ma le bi shud+d+he pra b+ha NA nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ced bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ jo bo a ti sha dang / dge bshes 'brom ston pas sngags rnams par bcos so//

item.tib: snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: kA ru Na a gra nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: kro d+ha bi dza ya kal+pa gu h+ya tan+t+ra
item.coloph: khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//
item.note: Between f.356b and f357a a larger part of the text is missing, which also includes the marker for section 8. In D, the final chapter is counted as no. 22; S concurs with Z.
item.chap:
1. rgyud 'byung ba bya ba'i skabs te dang po'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
321b3

2. yi dags phal po che'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
325a8

3. yi dags phal po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
326a7

4. be con gyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i mchod pa rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
328b4

5. be con gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par phye ba ste lnga pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
331a8

6. ro langs ma'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par phye ba ste drug pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
343b2

7. khro bo'i brtul zhugs rim par phye ba bdun pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
348a5

9. 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi khro bo'i zhib mo phyi ma rim par phye ba ste dgu pa rdzogs soMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
358a6

10. 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi cho ga zhib mo phyi ma'i yang phyi ma rim par phye ba ste bcu pa rdzogs soMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
359b6

11. gshin rje rab tu 'jom+s pa'i yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
361b1

12. gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i yi ge gcig pa'i ri mo dang / mchod pa dang / bzlas pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba bcu gnyis pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
370b3

13. gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i brtul zhugs rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
371b8

14. khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo bsdus pa rim par che ba ste bcu bzhi pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
372b1

15. khro rgyal po gshin rje gshed zhal drug hUM zhes bya ba las byung ba'i cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
373b6

16. khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
375a6

17. khro bo rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi rgyal po rtog pa phyi ma'i yang phyi ma gsang ba'i le'u bcu bdun pa rdzogs soMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
382a5

21. bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, pa1001PD127559rgyud
393b8

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badz+ra b+he ra ba d+ha ra Ni nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs so/// 'phags pas gsungs pa'i gzung rnams rnam mang yang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs/ /bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di/ /kun gyis thun mong ma yin rnal 'byor dam pa'i gzungs/ /rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban d+he skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo//

item.tib: 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mahA daN+Da nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya rat+na mA la nA ma a pa rA dzi ta
item.coloph: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: sngags snying bzhi 'byung smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa
item.coloph: sngags snying bzhi 'byung smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. This text is not included in Tshal pa. In Samten et al. 2012 and Pagel and Gaffney 1996, this short text is counted as a part of the preceding work.

item.tib: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba an+ta rA ya bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba a b+ha ya pra dA nA na ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa 'gro lding pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya drA bi Da bit+yA rA dza
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs
item.skttrans: gA thA d+wI yi d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ge yu ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsun+de de bi nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags ma lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su mu khan nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ba hu pu tra pa ti sa ra nA nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa bu mang po ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sap+ta be ta Da ka nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha siM ha dang / ban d+he ye shes snying po'i sdes bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya b+ha dra ka rA tri nA ma sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya o dza pra t+ya ha ra Ni nA ma sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni nA ma bid+ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a k+Sha ro ka pra shA ma ni sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: k+Sha ya'i nad sel ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: k+Sha ya'i nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pa (vol. 83), 366b8-367a1.

item.tib: 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ar+sha pra ma ni sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba ro ga pra sha ma ni nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pa (vol. 83), 366a4-366a6.

item.tib: 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dz+wa ra pra sha ma ni nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pa (vol. 83), 366b8-367a1.

item.tib: mdangs phyir mi 'phrog pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rdzogs so//
item.volcoloph: Scribal and revision note at the end of the volume in smaller dbu can writing: s+wa s+ti/ rgya shog dkar gyi mdangs ni spyan ras gzigs/ /gur kum gser mdog thigs ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /rgya gnag yi ge mthing mdog rdo rje 'dzin/ /rigs gsum mgon la sbyar nas yig bris 'di/ /sa mo bya yi zla ba dgu pa ru/ /sprang po blo bzang brtan pa nga yi bris/ /ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhu dag pa/ /zangs dkar ras chen 'brug rgya mtsho dang / /tog pa dbu mdzad don 'grub gnyis kyi mdzad/ /'di las ma dag skyon gyi dri ma dag /'dug na mkhas pa rnams kyis 'chos par mdzod/ /dge'o//.
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pa (vol. 83), 367a1-367a4.

item.tib: 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ba pu le pra be sha ma hA sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: The colophon in D shows minimal differences in phrasing; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tsau ra bi d+h+win s+na nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba an+ta ra saM grA sa d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra Ni

item.tib: 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya kAny+tsa ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
item.coloph: 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.coloph: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
item.coloph: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
item.coloph: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
item.coloph: byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa
item.coloph: 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya mai tri pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / da na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: a mr-i ta b+ha ba nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: yi dags kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: yi dags mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga
item.coloph: yi dags mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so//

item.tib: ye shes skar mda'i snying po
item.coloph: ye shes skar mda'i snying po'o//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pha (vol. 84), 87a2-87a7.

item.tib: shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: shes rab skyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA sa mA dza sU tra na nA ma ma hA sU traM
item.coloph: mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pra dz+nyA bar+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya d+har+mA sA ga ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA par+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya big+h+nan bi na ya ka ra tA d+ha ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: A TA nA TI ya ma sU tran nA ma ma hA sU traM
item.coloph: mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tri dang / pradz+nyA bar+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sprin chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha
item.coloph: 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha b+ha ta maN+Da li sar+ba nA ga h+ri da yan
item.coloph: 'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya nA ga rA dza bI ra pri ts+tsha nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: gra ha m-i tra ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: gra ha mA tri ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ba su d+ha ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa
item.coloph: ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. In Skorupski 1985 this was not identified as a separate text, but taken to be part of the previous text.

item.tib: 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ga Na pa ti h+ri da ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po rdzogs so//

item.tib: tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: ma hA ga Na pa ti tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+wi paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas/ 'jig rten dngos grub ched du ni/ /rgya gar yul nas bsnams nas byon/ /rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas la gtad nas/ /rgyud 'di bsam pas grub pa yin//

item.tib: dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya shrI ma hA kA la nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las thar bar byed pa
item.coloph: 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs/ rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pha (vol. 84), 162a5-162b4.

item.tib: lha mo nag mo che'i gzungs
item.skttrans: de bi ma hA kA li nA ma d+ha ra Ni

item.tib: dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'i rgyud
item.skttrans: shrI de bi kA li pra ma rA dza tan+t+ra ka li
item.coloph: bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so//
item.note: Missing folios: 194b and 195a.

item.tib: dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.skttrans: shrI de wi kA li aSh+Ta sha ta ka
item.coloph: dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa
item.coloph: rdzogs so//

item.coloph: rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening and the title is also not mentioned at the end of the text. This text is not included in Tshal pa. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pha (vol. 84), 172b1-172b5.

The text has no formal opening and the title is also not mentioned at the end of the text. This text is found in D, but not identified as a separate text in Ui 1934. It is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, pha (vol. 84), 172b5-172b7.

item.tib: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha h+r-i da yaM nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha h+r-i da yaM ma hA na na ma d+d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha bA ra ra mi ta Sha Ta pA ri pU ra ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI war+ma dang / lo tsa ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /lo tsa ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: sa bcu pa'i gzungs
item.skttrans: da sha b+hu mi d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: sa bcu pa'i gzungs phan yon dang rtog pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha kal+pA rA dza bi d+hi nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga las phyung ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI war+ma dang / lo tsa ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sh+wa ra e ka da sha mu kha nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags pa zhal bcu gcig pa'i rig sngags kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo
item.coloph: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo rdzogs so//
item.note: Missing folios: 353b and 354a.

item.tib: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//
item.volcoloph: Scribal note at the end of the volume in smaller size dbu can writing: yi ge 'dri byed a lci pa tshe ring rgya mtsho lags//. Further, revision note by a different hand: ma dpe ci bzhin zhus dag pa zangs dkar pa bsam gtan chos 'phel dang / tog pa don grub lags// dge'o//.
item.note: Missing folios: 383b and 384a.

item.tib: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha kal+pa rA dza
item.coloph: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ji ltar rnyed pa de bzhin bris pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //'di ni sngon gyi lo tsa ba mkhas pa bzhi tsam gyis bgos nas bsgyur ba la/ bar skabs bar skabs su chad cing mjug ma tshang ba las/ bla ma dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i phyag nas rgya dpe byung zhing / chad pa gsob pa dang mjug sgyur cig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas/ bam po bcu pa'i nang du/ las kyi don kun sgrub par byed/ /ces pa nas/ gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig /ces pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gnyis pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang don khyad par can gyi ched du/ zhes pa nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur te/ zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gsum pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang / zhes pa nas/ mi gang tshad du brko bar bya/ /zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bzhi pa'i nang du/ pad+ma dang / chu dang / yungs dkar la yongs su bzlas te/ zhes pa nas / ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing / lan bdun du/ zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bzhi pa dang bco lnga pa'i mtshams su/ dngul gyi pog por brgyad dang / zhes pa nas/ gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do/ /zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu drug pa dang bcu bdun pa'i mtsham su/ de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ zhes pa nas/ phyag rgya'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o/ zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bdun pa/ zhes pa dang / de ma thag par bam po bco brgyad pa'i mtshams su/ de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo/ zhes pa'i bar rnams kyi hor kong bsabs shing / 'jug yongs su rdzogs par shAk+ya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'i yi ge pa ni yo ga pa grub pa dpal bzang po'o/ /kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o/ /zhes pa nas/ gter bsgrul na/ zhes pa'i bar rgya dpe la mi 'dug go//
item.volcoloph: Revision note at the end of the volume in smaller size dbu can writing: ma dpe ji ltar zhus dag pa/ /zangs dkar pa dkon mchog yar 'phel dang/ tog pa ye shes 'phrin las lags//.
item.note: From f.346 to f.358 the folios numbers were corrected. Only the very last phrase of the colophon in D is not found in Z and S.

item.note: Missing folios: 2-3, 5b and 6a, 8b and 9a, 12, including chapter markers 1 and 4.

item.coloph: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzam+b+ha la dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong pa ris bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sa man+ta b+ha drA nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: siM ha nA da tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta pradz+nyA kA ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs seng ge sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ba lo ki te sh+wa rA ya siM ha nA da na ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //kha che'i yul dur khrod 'bri sa ka rang byung gi mchod rten rtsar dngos grub brnyed pa'i rje btsun ma rdo rje sems ma dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba 'gar shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: seng ge sgra'i gzungs
item.coloph: seng ge sgra'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ngag gi dbang phyug dang / glog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bsgyur pa'o//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mtshan brgya rtsa rgyad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sh+wA ra yA nA aSh+Ta sha ta kan
item.coloph: rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+yA a ba lo ki te sh+wa ra s+ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+yA ru tsi ra ang ga yASh+Thi nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa lus kyis dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+yA a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma a pa rA dzi ta

item.skttrans: pra dz+nyA bar d+ha nI nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: shes rab bskyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA kA ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ban d+he ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: pra dz+nyA bar d+ha nI nA ma d+hA ra Ni

item.tib: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: sar+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na sat+wa A lo ka na bud d+ha k+She tre san dar+sha na b+yu ha nA ma mahA ya na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren tra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ ban d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyi bsgyur//
item.note: Missing folios: 62, 65. In the colophon of D, the final phrasing differs slightly; S and V concur with Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sh+wa ra ma Ni tsin+ta kal+pa pra Ni d+hir+ba ba
item.coloph: yid bzhin kyi nor bu'i rtogs pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The latter part of the text, i.e., f.87b2-90b6, is not part of the text in D. It is also possible that this part constitutes a separate work not included in D.

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs phan yon mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: mahA kA ru Ni kA na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sh+wa ra d+hA ra Ni a nu shaM sa sa ha ti sU traM ta saM gri hi ta
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po'i gzungs phan yon dang bcas pa zhes bya ba mdo las bsdus pa rdzogs so// //dge slong shAk+ya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ba lo ki sh+wa rA mA te nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum sgrol ma las sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sar+ba ta thA ga ta mA ta ni tA ra bi sh+wa kar+ma b+ha ba tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tshog+s bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+mA shrI mi tra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
item.note: Missing folios: 101b and 102a, including marker for chapter 3. There is no indication of chapter 23.

item.tib: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tA ra ba dra nA na aSh+Ta sha ta ka
item.coloph: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.skttrans: tA ra de bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka na
item.coloph: sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, ma (vol. 86), 109b8-113a8.

item.tib: rje btsun sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: b+ha Ta tA tA rA aSh+Ta sha da ka nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta bud d+ha A ka ra dang / /bod kyi lo tsa ba ga ru ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: Even though the title is similar, this work is different from rKTs721. The text is not found in D. It corresponds to S679, L560, T676, V749.

item.tib: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, ma (vol. 86), 114a4-114a7.

item.tib: 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya tA rA s+wa phra ti dz+nyA nA d+ha ra ni
item.coloph: rdo rje mchog gi rgyud las btus/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ya sho ba ti d+hA ra ni
item.coloph: 'phags ma pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byams las bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ur+d+ha dza TA ma hA kal+pa ma hA bo d+hi sat+wA bi ku nar+b+pa Na pa Ta la bi sa rA b+ha ga ba tI Ar+ya tA ra mU la kal+pa nA ma
item.coloph: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so// //'di ni jo bo chen po a ti sha'i phyag dpe r+wa sgreng nas dka' thub chen pos gdan drangs nas/ shAk+ya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis 'phar ba'i lo/ cho 'phrul chen po rta'i zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni/ lo tsa ba chen po de nyid kyi zhabs drung du nye bar gnas pa/ shAk+ya'i dge slong bsod nams lhun grub kyis bgyis so/ /paN+Di ta la ma gtug shing/ /dpe mang 'grel pa ma rnyed pas/ /sgra don log par gyur srid na/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bcos par gsol//
item.volcoloph: Scribal and revision note at the end of the volume in smaller size dbu can writing: s+wa s+ti/ chu byi'i zla ba lnga pa'i yar ngo bco lngar dbu tshugs nas/ zla ba drug pa'i tshes nyer gnyis la grub par bris/ yig 'dris pa ni blo bzang brtan pa yin/ ma phyi ci 'dra'i zhus dag pa/ zangs dkar pa dpon slob 'brug rgya mtsho dang / tog pa ye shes 'phrin las kyis mdzad pa zhus dag/.
item.note: Missing folios: 132b and 133a, 158, 163, 171, 302, 328, 462-463, 471. Many folios are severely damaged.

item.tib: dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa
item.skttrans: bi ma la pra b+ha pa ri prits+tsha
item.coloph: theg pa chen po'i mdo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa'i mdo 'di shin tu dag par yod pas yid ches kyi gnas so/ /gzhan 'khrugs chad yod pa mang bar snang ste/ glegs bam mang du bstas so//
item.note: Missing folios: 35-39.

item.tib: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya grI ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya a ba lo ki te sh+wa rA ha ya grI ba d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya grI ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: phyir bzlog pa 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya'o
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bi dza ya ba ti nA ma prat+yaM gi rA
item.coloph: phyir zlog pa 'phags rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa par+Na sha ba ri'i mdo
item.coloph: 'phags pa par+Na sha ba ri'i mdo rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya par+N+Na sha ba ri nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags ma ri khrod ma lo ma gyon ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya'o
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ba la ba ti nA ma pra t+yaM gi ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa phyir bzlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: mchog thob pa'i rigs sngags
item.skttrans: a gra bid+h+ya man+t+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa mchog pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

item.tib: dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa
item.coloph: dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya shrI ma hA de bi b+yA ka ra Na
item.coloph: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA shri yaH sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab po//

item.tib: dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa
item.coloph: dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sar+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bid+yA ut+ta ma ma hA tan+t+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra hA b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badz+ra pA tA la nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza
item.coloph: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba ji snyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Ti ta brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / sgra bsgyur gyi mkhas pa sgra'i gtsug lag la ma rmongs pa gsang sngags 'dzin pa kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur/ lha min dbang po'i sgo glegs 'joms byed pa/ /gsungs rab dam pa dpal ldan kun dga' yi/ /rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur 'di la sgra nyams pa/ /gang lags de la mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod/ /sa 'og 'khrul 'khor bde legs rin chen gter/ /gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dam pa'i bka'/ /gangs can 'gro la phan pa'i blo gros kyis/ /bsgyur ba'i bsod nams 'dzin bcas rnams la byin//
item.note: Missing folios: 39b and 40a.

item.tib: 'byung po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
item.skttrans: b+hu ta TA ma ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma
item.coloph: 'byung po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu drug pa las ji snyed pa rnams rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha A ka ra bar+ma dang / lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya nI lA ma ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni kal+pa nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur//
item.note: The colophon in D mentions different translators and revisers; S and V concur with Z. The same work is listed earlier, as Z474, with the same names as given in D.

item.tib: rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa
item.coloph: lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: badz+ra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsags pa'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA badz+ra me ru shi kha ra kU Ta gU ra d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya badz+ra a dzi ta a na la pra mo ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: badz+ra suk+Sh+ma a bra ti ha ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs//

item.tib: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya da sha badz+ra pA Ni na h+r-i da ya
item.coloph: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya kuN+Ta l+ya m+r-i ta hri da ya tsa tur nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po rdzogs so//

item.tib: khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags
item.skttrans: kro d+ha b+hur kuM kU Ta rA dza sto tra man+t+ra
item.coloph: khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags so//

item.tib: 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA ba la nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
item.note: The colophon in D provides the names of translators and revisers.

item.tib: 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i rgyud kyi rtog pa
item.skttrans: Ar+yA badz+ra shriM kha lA s+ya tan+t+ra kal+pa
item.coloph: 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa au rgyan nas byung ba rdzogs so// //paN+Tita a tu la dA sha badz+ras zhus nas/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba klu'i dam tshig
item.skttrans: badz+ra dun+da nA ga sa ma ya
item.coloph: rdo rje mchu'i cho ga rdzogs so//

item.tib: rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya lo ta duN+Ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa lcags kyi mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya lo ta duN+Te nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa lcags mchu'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa lcags mchu nag po
item.skttrans: Ar+ya sa d+hr-i sha a ya auSh+Tha
item.coloph: 'phags pa lcags mchu nag po'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i gzungs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma Ni b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i gzungs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur ba//

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nor bu bzang po'i rtog pa
item.skttrans: ma Ni b+ha drA ya yak+Sha se na kal+pa
item.coloph: nor bu bzang po'i rtog pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ji snyed tshad kyi sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: In D, the title given at the beginning of the text differs slightly; S concurs with Z.

item.tib: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa
item.skttrans: ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye na ra ku pa ra kal+pa
item.coloph: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gar mkhan mchog gi rig pa'i rgyal po spyad dang dngos grub sgrub par bklags pas thams cad 'grub pa brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha na gup+ta zhes bya ba spyod mdzad chos kyis rdo rje'i slob ma dngos las/ rab zhi lo tsa bas tho ling du bsgyur pa'o//
item.note: In Skorupski 1985 and also Pagel and Gaffney 1996, the following text is counted as part of this one and not as a separate work.

243a6

9. gsal snang dus gsum brtag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, tsha1051PD127564rgyud
245a8

10. gar mkhan mchog kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, tsha1051PD127564rgyud
246a7

item.tib: gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi rgyud
item.coloph: gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi rgyud rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhas pa dA na gup+ta las/ rab bzhi lo tsa ba'i lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag tho ling rgyan du bsgyur pa'o//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. In Skorupski 1985 and also Pagel and Gaffney 1996, the preceding text is counted as part of this one and not as a separate work.
item.chap:
11. rnam thos sras kyis ming gi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, tsha1051PD127564rgyud

250b7

251b7

14. yi ge brgyad pa'i las tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, tsha1051PD127564rgyud
252b1

15. dpal lha mo'i 'bru'i phung po spel ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, tsha1051PD127564rgyud
253a6

16. gnod sbyin gyi tshogs ngal bso po'i dmag gi sde rnams sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'oMW1PD127393rgyud, tsha1051PD127564rgyud
255b7

item.tib: 'phags pa nor 'dzin dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la shri nA ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa gnod 'dzin dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: Obvious misspelling of nor 'dzin instead of gnod 'dzin in the title at the beginning of the text. This misspelling is also suggested by a later correction in the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs bde byed ces bya ba
item.skttrans: kA ru Ni ka s+ye Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra su shaM ka ra na ma d+ha ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa nor 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi bzungs bde byed ces bya ba rdzogs so//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, tsha (vol. 88), 232a3-232b5.

item.tib: 'phags pa gnod gnas dbang po ji ltar byung ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya tha la sA ta gal+pa na ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa gnod gnas kyi dbang po ji ltar 'byung ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsha ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
item.skttrans: Ar+yA dzam+b+ha la nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka
item.coloph: 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa mep kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.skttrans: Ar+ya me kha la nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: 'phags pa me kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //srung ba dang bcas cho ga dang bcas pas mi mjed kyi sems can thams dang srung bar gyur cig s+wA hA/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

item.tib: 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbugs chen po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya bi d+yA rA dzA sh+wA sa ma hA nA ma
item.coloph: 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbugs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA bar+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

item.tib: rin po che brdar ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: rin po che brdar ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa
item.coloph: sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: bskor pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: bskor pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa dkon mchog gi rten bskor ba bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya phra dak+Sha rat+na tra ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni
item.coloph: bskor ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: da k+Shi NI pA ra sho d+ha ni nA ma
item.coloph: 'dul ba lung las rnam par nges pa'i mdo las byung ba yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: phyag bya ba'i gzungs
item.note: The text has no formal opening and breaks off in the first line of the text. The title is taken from the colophon of S. In S and other Them spangs ma Kanjurs two further texts, what would be Z745 and Z746, are listed, which were obviously omitted due to a copying mistake in Z.

item.tib: ma zhu ba'i nad 'byang ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: ma zhu ba'i nad 'byang ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon. The text is attached to the first part of Z744; the two texts that would follow in between are left out in Z.

item.tib: 'phags pa sdang ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'phags pa sdang ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: khro ba zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: khro ba zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: khros pa zhi ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: khros pa zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: tshig btsan pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: tshig btsan pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: bdag bsrung pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: bdag bsrung pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa yid du 'ongs ba zhes bya ba
item.coloph: yid du 'ong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: las grub pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: las grub pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: dug zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: bcings pa las grol pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: bcings pa las grol pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa bdud thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: bdud skrag par byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: rma 'byor par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags
item.coloph: rma 'byor par byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: me'i zug rngu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: me'i zug rngu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sngags
item.coloph: mkhris pa'i nad sel bar byed par gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: bad kan gyi nad sel ba'i gzungs sngags
item.coloph: bad kan gyi nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: k+Sha ya'i nad sel pa'i gzungs
item.coloph: k+Sha ya'i nad sel pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
item.note: The text has no formal opening; the title is taken from the colophon.

item.tib: 'phags pa rims nad srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba
item.coloph: rims dang srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//

item.tib: lus kyi zag pa sbyin par btang ba'i gzungs
item.coloph: 'di dag ni bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdo rgyud nas phyung ste/ ba ri lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga gsang ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sar+ba ma N+Dal sA ma n+ya bi d+hi na gu h+ya tan+t+ra
item.coloph: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa rim par phye ba/ phyag na rdo rje dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyis bstan pa/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga gsang ba spyi'i rgyud rdzogs so//

item.tib: bsam gtan gyi phyi ma rim par phye ba
item.skttrans: d+h+yA not+ta ra ba Ta la kra ma
item.coloph: bsam gtan gyi phyi ma rim par phye ba rdzogs so// //spyir k+lau ka lnga bcu rtsa gsum mo skad//
item.note: The colophon in S has the same spelling mistake, k+lau ka, as in Z.

item.tib: legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po las sgrub pa'i thabs rim par phye ba
item.skttrans: su sid+d+hi ka ra ma hA tan+t+ra sa d+ha no ba ma yi ka pa Ta la
item.coloph: legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po las sgrub pa'i thabs bsdus pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: Ar+ya su bA hu pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma tan+t+ra
item.coloph: 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//

item.tib: 'phags pa yongs su sngo ba'i rgyal po chen po sngags dang bcas pa
item.skttrans: Ar+ya ma hA pa ri Na ta rA dza [...]
item.coloph: 'phags pa yongs su sngo ba'i rgyal po sngags dang bcas pa ji snyed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Due to a damage of the manuscript the final part of the Sanskrit title is not legible. Missing folios: 477b and 478a.

item.tib: 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi 'phreng pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan las nor bu chen po rin che la mkhas pa bsten pa yongs su sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: Ar+ya san d+hi mA la ma hA tan+t+ra bo d+hi sa tA ma hA bi ni Sh+Tsa ya nir de shAd ma hA ma Ni rat+na ko'u shal l+ya nir de sha ma hA pa ri Na ma na nA ma rA dza
item.coloph: 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi 'phreng ba chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las nor bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bsten pa yongs su sngo ba chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po d+har+ma ka ra dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal 'byor gyis bsgyur ba las/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//
item.note: Due to the bad condition of the manuscript parts of the Sanskrit title are difficult to decipher.

item.tib: 'phags pa yongs su sngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
item.skttrans: Ar+ya pa ri Na ta tsak+ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
item.coloph: yongs su sngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //li'i dge slong sde snod gsum dang ldan pa shI la d+ha r+mas rgya gar gyi d+ha r+ma rgya'i ye ge las/ ban d+he rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur ba'o//

item.tib: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa
item.skttrans: pany+tsa ta thA ga ta maM ga la gA tha
item.coloph: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//

item.tib: dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa
item.skttrans: rat+na tri s+was+ti gA tha
item.coloph: dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa rdzog+s so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
item.note: This work is not listed in Pagel and Gaffney 1996, but it is found in L: rgyud, tsha (vol. 88), 441b6-442a6.
